GSP33brssgo4u:9: tṛtīye adhyāye parā aparāsu vidyāsu sādhana āśrayo vicāraḥ prāyeṇātyagāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:12: prathamaṃ tāvat katibhiḥ cidadhikaraṇaiḥ sādhana āśrayavicāraśeṣameva anusarāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:13: 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.21)
GSP33brssgo4u:15: vijijñāsitavyaḥ' (chā. 8.7.1) iti ca evamādiśravaṇeṣu saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ sakṛt pratyayaḥ kartavya āhosvit āvṛttya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:16: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ sakṛt pratyayaḥ syāt prayājādivat /
GSP33brssgo4u:19: nanu asakṛt upadeśā udāhṛtāḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya iti evamādayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:20: evam api yāvat śabdam āvartayet sakṛt śravaṇaṃ sakṛt mananaṃ sakṛt nididhyāsanaṃ ca iti na atiriktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:21: sakṛt upadeśeṣu tu veda upāsīta iti evamādiṣu anāvṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:24: 'śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' iti evañjātīyako hi asakṛt upadeśaḥ pratyayāvṛttiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:25: nanu uktaṃ yāvat śabdameva āvartayet na adhikam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:28: darśanaparyavasānāni hi śravaṇādīni āvartyamānāni dṛṣṭārthāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:30: api ca upāsanaṃ nididhyāsanaṃ ca iti atyantarṇītāvṛttiguṇa eva kriyābhidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:31: tathā hi - loke gurum upāste rājānam upāsta iti ca yaḥ tātparyeṇa gurvādīn anuvartate sa evam ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:32: tathā dhyāyati proṣitanāthā patim iti yā nirantara smaraṇā patiṃ prati sā utkaṇṭhā sā evam abhidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:33: vidyupāstyoḥ ca vedānteṣu avyatirekeṇa prayogo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:34: kvacit vidinā upakramya upāsina upasaṃharati yathā - 'yastadveda yatsa veda sa mayaitaduktaḥ' (chā. 4.1.4) iti atra 'anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatāmupāḥse' (chā. 5.2.2) iti kvacit ca upāsina upakramya vidinā upasaṃharati yathā - 'mano
GSP33brssgo4u:35: brahmetyupāsīta' (chā. 3.18.1) iti atra 'bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.18.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:40: sādhanaṃ nirūpya phalaṃ nirūpyata ityadhyāyayorhatuphalabhāvaṃ saṃgatimāha-tṛtīya iti

GSP33brssgo4u:43: tadārabhya jīvanmuktistato dvitīyapāde utkrāntistṛtīye arcirādimārgasya gantavyasya ca nirṇayaścaturthe jñānopāsanayoḥ phalanirṇaya iti pādārthavivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:48: mokṣe viśeṣābhāvavacchravaṇādāvāvṛttiviśeṣo nāstīti dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇāvāntarasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /

GSP33brssgo4u:55: tathāpi dṛṣṭe saṃbhavatyadṛṣṭamātrakalpanānupapatteḥ śravaṇāderāvṛttidvārā sākṣātkāraphalasya ṣaḍjādau dṛṣṭatvādasakṛduktirāvṛttiṃ sūcayati dṛṣṭārthatvāditi
GSP33brssgo4u:61: sa raikvo yadveda tatprāṇatattvaṃ raikvādanyo 'pi yaḥ kaścidveda tatphale sarvamantarbhavatītyetadukte itthaṃ mayotkṛṣṭatvena sa raikva
GSP33brssgo4u:62: ukta iti haṃsaṃ prati haṃsāntaravacanaṃ, tacchrutvā raikvaṃ gatvovāca
GSP33brssgo4u:63: jānaśrutiḥ, he bhagavaḥ, etāṃ raikvaviditāṃ devatāṃ me 'nuśādhi
GSP33brssgo4u:71: tathā hi udgīthavijñānaṃ prastutya 'āditya udgīthaḥ' (chā. 1.5.1) iti etat ekaputratādoṣeṇa āpodya 'raśamīṃstavaṃ paryāvartayāt' (chā. 1.5.2) iti raśmibahutva vijñānaṃ bahuputratāyai vidadhat siddhavat pratyayāvṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:73: atra āha - bhavatu nāma sādhyaphaleṣu pratyayeṣu āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:75: yaḥ tu parabrahmaviṣayaḥ pratyayo nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvameva ātmabhūtaṃ paraṃ brahma samarpayati tatra kim arthāvṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:76: sakṛt śrutau ca brahma ātmatvapratīti anupapatteḥ āvṛtti abhyupagama iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:79: yadi hi 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.8.7) iti evañjātīyakaṃ vākyaṃ sakṛt śrūyamāṇaṃ brahmātmatva pratītiṃ na utpādayet tataḥ tadeva āvartyamānam
GSP33brssgo4u:81: atha ucyeta na kevalaṃ vākyaṃ kañcidarthaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ śaknoti ato yuktyapekṣaṃ vākyam anubhāvayiṣyati brahmātmatvam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:83: sā api hi yuktiḥ sakṛt pravṛttaiva svam artham anubhāvayiṣyati /
GSP33brssgo4u:84: athāpi syāt uktyā vākyena ca sāmānyaviṣayameva vijñānaṃ kriyate na viśeṣaviṣayam /
GSP33brssgo4u:85: yathā asti me hṛdaye śūlam ityato vākyāt gātra kampādi liṅgāt ca śūlasadbhāva sāmānyameva paraḥ pratipadyate na viśeṣam anubhavati yathā sa eva śūlī /
GSP33brssgo4u:86: viśeṣa anubhavaḥ ca avidyāyā nivartakaḥ tataḥ tadartha āvṛttiḥ iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:88: asakṛt api tāvat mātre kriyamāṇe viśeṣavijñāna utpatti asaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:89: na hi sakṛt prayuktābhyāṃ śāstrayuktibhyām anavagato viśeṣaḥ śatakṛtvaḥ api prayujyamānābhyām avagantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:90: tasmāt yadi śāstrayuktibhyāṃ viśeṣaḥ pratipādyate yadi vā sāmānyameva ubhayathā api sakṛt pravṛtte eva te svakāryaṃ kuruta iti āvṛtti anupayogaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:91: na ca sakṛt prayukte śāstrayuktī kasyacit api anubhavaṃ na utpādayata iti śakyate niyantuṃ vicitraprajñatvāt pratipattṛṇām /
GSP33brssgo4u:92: api ca aneka aṃśopete laukike padārthe sāmānya viśeṣavat ekena avadhānena ekam aṃśam avadhārayati apareṇa aparam iti syāt api abhyāsa upayogo yathā dīrghaprapāṭhakagrahaṇādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:93: na tu nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi sāmānya viśeṣarahite caitanyamātrātmake pramā utpattau abhyāsāpekṣā yukta iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:94: atra ucyate - bhavet āvṛtti ānarthakyaṃ taṃ prati yaḥ tattvamasi iti sakṛt
GSP33brssgo4u:96: yastu na śaknoti taṃ pratyupayujyata eva āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:97: tathā hi chāndogye 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chā. 6.8.7) iti udiśya 'bhūya
GSP33brssgo4u:98: eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatu' (chā. 6.8.7) iti punaḥ paricodyamānaḥ tat tat
GSP33brssgo4u:99: ādāśaṅkā kāraṇaṃ nirākṛtya tattvamasi iti eva asakṛt upadiśate /
GSP33brssgo4u:100: tathā ca 'śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 4.5.6) ityādi darśitam /
GSP33brssgo4u:101: nanu uktaṃ sakṛt śrutaṃ cet tattvamasi vākyaṃ svam artham anubhāvayituṃ na śaknoti tata āvartyamānam api na eva śakṣyati iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:104: dṛśyante hi sakṛt śrutāt vākyāt mandapratītaṃ vākyārtham āvartayantaḥ tat tat ābhāsavyudāsena samyak pratipadyamānāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:105: api ca tattvamasi iti etat vākyaṃ tvaṃ padārthasya tat padārthabhāvam ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo4u:106: tat padena ca prakṛtaṃ sat brahma īkṣitṛ jagato janmādikāraṇam abhidhīyate
GSP33brssgo4u:114: anubhāvātmako brahmasaṃjñakaḥ tat padārtho vedānta abhiyuktānāṃ prasiddhaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:115: tathā tvaṃpadārthaḥ api pratyagātmā śrotā dehāt ārabhya pratyagātmatayā saṃbhāvyamānaḥ caitanyaparyantatvena avadhāritaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:116: tatra yeṣām etau padārthau ajñāna saṃśaya viparyaya pratibaddhau teṣāṃ tatvamasi ityetat vākyaṃ svārthe pramāṃ na utpādayituṃ śaknoti padārthajñānapūrvakatvāt vākyārthasya iti atastāt pratyeṣṭavyaḥ padārthavivekaprayojanaḥ śāstrayuktyabhyāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:117: yadyapi ca pratipattavya ātmā niraṃśaḥ tathā api adhyāropitaṃ tasmin bahu aśatvaṃ deha indriya mano buddhi viṣaya vedanādi lakṣaṇaṃ tatra ekena avadhānena ekam aṃśam apohati apareṇa aparam iti yujyate tatra kramavatī pratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:119: yeṣāṃ punaḥ nipuṇamatīnāṃ na ajñānasaṃśayaviparyayalakṣaṇaḥ padārthaviṣayaḥ pratibandhaḥ asti te śaknuvanti sakṛt uktameva tattvamasi vākyārtham anubhavitum iti tān pratyāvṛtti ānarthakyam iṣṭameva /
GSP33brssgo4u:120: sakṛt utpanna eva hi ātmapratipattiḥ avidyāṃ nivartayati iti na atra kaścit api kramaḥ abhyupagamyate

GSP33brssgo4u:127: tathā bāhyatareṣu api putramitrādiṣu saṃtapyamāneṣu ahameva saṃtapya ityadi āropo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:129: dehādivat eva caitanyāt bahiḥ upalabhamānatvāt duḥkhitvādīnāṃ suṣuptādiṣu ca ananuvṛtteḥ /

GSP33brssgo4u:136: ātmanyeva ca saṃtuṣṭasya kāryaṃ na vidyate' (gī. 3.17) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:137: yasya tu na eṣaḥ anubhavo drāgiva jāyate taṃ pratyanubhavārtha eva āvṛtti abhyupagamaḥ /

GSP33brssgo4u:140: niyuktasya ca asmin adhikṛtaḥ ahaṃ kartā mayā idaṃ mandam apratibhānāt taṃ brahmapratyayāt viparītapratyaya utpadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:141: yaḥ tu svayameva mandamatiḥ apratibhānāt taṃ vākyārthaṃ jihāset tasya etasmin eva vākyārthe sthirīkāra āvṛttyādi vāco yuktyā abhyupeyate /

GSP33brssgo4u:190: kathaṃ punaḥ ātmaśabde pratyagātmaviṣaye śrūyamāṇe saṃśaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:191: ucyate - ayam ātmaśabdo mukhyaḥ śakyate abhyupagantuṃ sati jīva īśvarayoḥ abhedasaṃbhava itarathā tu gauṇaḥ ayam abhyupagantavya iti manyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:192: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ na aham iti grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:193: na hi apahatapāpmatvādi guṇo viparīta guṇatvena śakyate grahītuṃ viparīta guṇo ca apahatapāpmatvādi guṇatvena /
GSP33brssgo4u:194: apahatapāpmatvādi guṇaḥ ca parameśvaraḥ tadviparītaguṇaḥ tu śārīraḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:195: īśvarasya ca saṃsāri ātmatva īśvara abhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:197: saṃsāriṇaḥ api īśvara ātmatve adhikāri abhāvāt śāstra ānarthakyameva,
GSP33brssgo4u:199: anyatve api tādātmya darśanaṃ śāstrāt kartavyaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādidarśanam iti cet kāmamevaṃ bhavatu /
GSP33brssgo4u:200: na tu saṃsāriṇo mukhya ātma īśvara ityetat naḥ prāpayitavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:201: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ātma ityeva parameśvaraḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:202: tathā hi parameśvara prakriyāyāṃ jābālā ātmatvena eva etam upagacchanti -
GSP33brssgo4u:203: 'tvaṃ vā ahamasmi bhagavo devato 'haṃ vai tvamasi bhagavo deveti' iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:204: tathā anye api 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' ityevam ādaya ātmatva upagamā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:205: grāhayanti ca ātmatvena eva īśvaraṃ vedāntavākyāni 'eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ' (bṛ. 3.4.1) 'eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛ. 3.7.3)
GSP33brssgo4u:207: yat uktaṃ pratīka darśanam idaṃ viṣṇupratimā nyāyena bhaviṣyati iti tat ayuktaṃ gauṇatva prasaṅgāt
GSP33brssgo4u:209: yatra hi pratīkadṛṣṭiḥ abhipreyate sakṛdeva tatra vacanaṃ bhavati yathā -
GSP33brssgo4u:211: iha punaḥ tvam aham asmi ahaṃ ca tvam asi iti āha, ataḥ pratīka śruti
GSP33brssgo4u:214: tathā hi - 'atha yo 'nyāṃ devatāmupāste 'nyo 'sāvanyo 'hamīti na sa veda'
GSP33brssgo4u:215: (bṛ. 1.4.10) 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.5.7)
GSP33brssgo4u:216: iti evamādyā bhūyasī śrutiḥ bhedadarśanam apavadati /
GSP33brssgo4u:217: yat tu uktaṃ na viruddhaguṇayoḥ anyonya ātmasaṃbhava iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:223: na hi īśvarasya saṃsāri ātmatvaṃ pratipādyata iti abhyupagacchāmaḥ kiṃ tarhi saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsāritva apohena īśvarātmatvaṃ pratipipāyiṣitam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:224: evaṃ ca sati advaita īśvarasya apahatapāpmatvādiguṇatā viparītaguṇatā tu itarasya mithyā iti vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:225: yat api uktam adhikāri abhāvaḥ pratyakṣādivirodhaḥ ca iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:229: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 2.4.14) ityādinā hi prabodhe pratyakṣādi abhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:230: pratyakṣādi abhāve śruteḥ api abhāvaprasaṅga iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:234: 4.3.22) iti vacanāt iṣyata eva asmābhiḥ śruteḥ api abhāvaḥ prabodhe /

GSP33brssgo4u:240: tasmāt ātma iti eva īśvare mano dadhīta // 3 //
GSP33brssgo4u:242: pūrvatra dhyānāderāvṛttiruktā tāmupajīvya tattvajñānārthaṃ dhyānāvṛttikāle kimahaṃ brahmeti dhyātavyamuta matsvāmīśvara ityaikyabhedamānābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-ya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:246: abhedaśrutīnāṃ gauṇatvamukhyatve ubhayatra phalaṃ, yadyapyayaṃ pratyakṣādivirodhaparihāro dvitīyādhyāyasaṃgatastathāpyaikyaśruteraviruddhatvaniścayasya samādhāvantaraṅgatvādiha saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:248: kiñca kimīśvarasya jīvamātratvamaikyaṃ jīvasyeśvaramātratvaṃ veti vikalpya krameṇa dūṣayati-īśvarasya cetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:252: abhedaśrutīnāṃ phalavadapūrvārthatātparyeṇa gauṇatvāyogādbhedaśrutīnāṃ kalpitabhedānuvāditvātpratyakṣāderapi tadviṣayatvādvimbapratibimbayoriva viruddhadharmāṇāṃ mithyātvānmukhyamaikyamiti siddhānyayati-evamityādinā
GSP33brssgo4u:253: īśvarasya jīvatvaṃ na pratipādyaṃ yeneśvarābhāvaḥ syātkintu jīvasyeśvaratvam /
GSP33brssgo4u:257: varṇeṣu kramasvarayorabhāvādupalabdhadhvanisthayorāropo vācyastathā cāropitakramasvaraviśiṣṭavarṇātmakavedasya mithyātvaṃ durvāraṃ, vādināṃ satyatvāgrahastvavidyāvijṛmbhita iti vedasatyatvābhāvo na doṣa
GSP33brssgo4u:273: 3.18.1) 'tathā ādityo brahmetyādeśaḥ' (chā. 3.19.1) 'sa yo nāma brahmetyupāste' (chā. 7.1.5) iti evamādiṣu pratīka upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ -
GSP33brssgo4u:274: kiṃ teṣu api ātmagrahaḥ kartavyo na vā iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:278: brahmaṇaḥ śrutiṣu ātmatvena prasiddhatvāt pratīkānām api brahmavikāratvāt brahmatve satyām ātmatva upapatteḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:279: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na pratīkeṣu ātma matiṃ badhnīyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:280: na hi sa upāsakaḥ pratīkāni vyastāni ātmatvenākalayet /
GSP33brssgo4u:281: yat punaḥ brahmavikāratvāt pratīkānāṃ brahmatvaṃ tataḥ ca ātmatvam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:284: vikārasvarūpa upamardena hi nāmādi jātasya brahmatvameva āśrite bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:285: svarūpa upamarde ca nāmādīnāṃ kutaḥ pratīkatvam ātmagraho vā /
GSP33brssgo4u:286: na ca brahmaṇa ātmatvāt brahmadṛṣṭi upadeśeṣu ātmadṛṣṭiḥ kalpyā /
GSP33brssgo4u:288: kartṛtvādi saṃvarga saṃsāra dharmanirākaraṇe hi brahmaṇa ātmatva upadeśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:290: ataḥ ca upāsakasya pratīkaiḥ samatvāt ātmagraho na upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:291: na hi rūcaka svastikayoḥ itaretara ātmatvam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:292: suvarṇa ātmatvena iva tu brahma ātmatvena ekatve pratīka abhāvaprasaṅgam avocāma /
GSP33brssgo4u:296: yathā brahmaṇyabhedasattavādahaṅgraha ukta evaṃ pratīkeṣvapi brahmavikāratayā jīvābhinnabrahmābhinnatvājjīvābhedasattvenāhaṅgrahaḥ kārya iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:305: vikārasya brahmaṇā svarūpaikyāyogādbādhenaikyaṃ vācyaṃ pratīkabādhe copāstividhirna syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:307: tathāca bādhamūlabrahmaikyajñānaṃ dvārīkṛtya pratīkeṣvahaṅgrahopāstikalpanā na yuktā, bādhavirodhādityāha-naca
GSP33brssgo4u:309: ato jīvapratīkayoḥ svarūpabhedādahaṅgrahe vidhyaśravaṇācca nāhaṅgraha iti phalitamāha-ataśceti
GSP33brssgo4u:310: yathā rucakasvastikayoḥ suvarṇātmanaikye 'pi mitho naikyaṃ tathā
GSP33brssgo4u:312: yadica dharmivyatirekeṇa tayorabhāvaniścayādvastvaikyaṃ tadopāsanoccheda ukta ityarthaḥ //4//
GSP33brssgo4u:318: teṣu eva udāharaṇeṣu anyaḥ saṃśayaḥ - kim ādityādi dṛṣṭayo brahmaṇi adhyasitavyāḥ kiṃvā brahmadṛṣṭiḥ ādityādiṣu iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:320: atra hi brahmaśabdasya ādityādiśabdaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:321: ādityo brahma prāṇo brahma vidyut brahma ityādi samāna vibhakti nirdeśāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:322: na ca atra āñjasaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam avakalpate /
GSP33brssgo4u:324: na hi bhavati gauḥ aśva iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:325: nanu prakṛtivikārabhāvāt brahma ādityānāṃ mṛt śarāvādivat sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:329: paramātma vākyaṃ ca idaṃ tadānīṃ syāt tataḥ ca upāsana adhikāro bādhyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:331: tasmāt brāhmaṇaḥ agniḥ vaiśvānara ityādivat anyatra anyadṛṣṭi adhyāse sati kva kindṛṣṭiḥ adhyasyatām iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:332: tatra aniyamo niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt ityevaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:333: athavā ādityādi dṛṣṭaya eva brahmaṇi kartavyā iti evaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:334: evaṃ hi ādityādi dṛṣṭibhiḥ brahma upāsitaṃ bhavati brahma upāsanaṃ ca phalavat iti śāstramaryādā
GSP33brssgo4u:336: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - brahmadṛṣṭiḥ eva ādityādiṣu syāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:341: tathā ca laukiko nyāyo anugato bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:342: utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭiḥ hi nikṛṣṭe adhyasitavya iti laukiko nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:346: na hi kṣattṛdṛṣṭiparigṛhīto rājā nikarṣaṃ nīyamānaḥ śreyase syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:347: nanu śāstraprāmāṇyāt anāśaṅkanīyaḥ atra pratyavāya prasaṅgo na ca lokikena nyāyena śāstrīyā dṛṣṭiḥ niyantuṃ yukta iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:348: atra ucyate - nirdhārite śāstrārtha etat evaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:349: saṃdigdhe tu tasmin nirṇayaṃ prati lokikaḥ api nyāya āśrīyanāṇo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:350: tena ca utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭi adhyāse śāstrārthe avadhāryamāṇe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭim adhyasyan pratyaveyāt iti śliṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:351: prāthamyāt ca ādityādi śabdānāṃ mukhyārthatvam avirodhāt gṛhītavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:352: taiḥ svārthavṛttibhiḥ avaruddhāyāṃ buddhau paścāt avatarato brahmaśabdasya mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānādhikaraṇya asaṃbhavāt brahmadṛṣṭividhānārthata eva avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:353: itiparatvāt api brahmaśabdasya eṣa eva artho nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:354: tathā hi 'brahmetyādeśaḥ' 'brahmetyupāsīta' 'brahametyupāste' iti ca sarvatra itiparaṃ brahmaśabdam uccārayati śuddhān tu ādityādi śabdān /
GSP33brssgo4u:355: tata- ca yathā śuktikāṃ rajatam iti pratyeti ityatra śuktivacana eva
GSP33brssgo4u:356: śuktikā śabdo rajataśabdaḥ tu rajatapratīti lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:357: pratyetyeva hi kevalaṃ rajatam iti na tu tatra rajatam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:358: evam atra api ādityādīn brahma iti pratīyāt iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:359: vākyaśeṣaḥ api ca dvitīyānirdeśena ādityādīneva upāstikriyayā vyāpyamānān darśayati - 'sa ya etamevaṃ vidvānādityaṃ brahmetyupāste' (chā. 3.19.4),
GSP33brssgo4u:362: yat tu uktaṃ brahma upāsanām eva atra ādaraṇīyaṃ phalatvāya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:364: uktena nyāyena ādityādīnām eva upāsyatva avagamāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:365: phalaṃ tu atithyādi upāsana iva ādityādi upāsane 'pi brahma eva dāsyati
GSP33brssgo4u:367: varṇitaṃ ca etat 'phalamata upapatteḥ' (bra.sū. 3.2.38) iti atra /
GSP33brssgo4u:368: īdṛśaṃ ca atra brahmaṇa upāsyatvaṃ yat pratīkeṣu tat dṛṣṭi adhyāropaṇaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādīnām // 5 //
GSP33brssgo4u:379: ataḥ pariśeṣādadhyāsa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyakāraṇam adhyāse ca niyāmakābhāvātsaṃśaya ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:382: atra vikāradṛṣṭibhirbrahmopāstisiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tu vikāradṛṣṭyā
GSP33brssgo4u:383: brahmaṇa upāsyatve nikarṣaprāptau satyāṃ phalavattvāsiddhervikārā evotkṛṣṭabrahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā iti phalam /
GSP33brssgo4u:384: kiñca laukikanyāyāviruddhārthasaṃbhave viruddhārtho na grāhyaḥ pratyavāyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:385: kiñca prathamaśrutānāmādityādipadānāmasaṃjātavirodhitayā mukhyārthatvagraho nyāyyaḥ, brahmaśabde ca dṛṣṭilakṣaṇāgrahaḥ, tathā cādityādayo brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā ityeva vākyārtha ityāha-prāthamyācceti brahmaśabdasyaiva dṛṣṭyarthatve hetvantaramāha-itiparatvāditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:386: itiśabdaśiraskaḥ śabdaḥ samabhivyāhṛtakriyālakṣaka iti loke prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:391: kiñca yaddṛṣṭyā vikārasyotkarṣaḥ tasya brahmaṇo viśeṣaṇatve
GSP33brssgo4u:400: 'iyamevargagniḥ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1) iti evamādiṣu aṅgāvabaddheṣu upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ kim ādityādiṣu udgīthādi dṛṣṭayo vidhīyante kiṃ vā udgīthādiṣu eva ādityādi dṛṣṭaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:401: tatra aniyamo niyamakāraṇa abhāvāt iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:402: na hi atra brahmaṇa iva kasyacit utkarṣaviśeṣaḥ avadhāryate 'brahma hi samasta jagat kāraṇatvāt apahatapāpmatvādi guṇayogāt ca ādityādibhya utkṛṣṭam iti śakyam avadhārayituṃ na tu āditya udgīthādīnāṃ vikāratva
GSP33brssgo4u:403: aviśeṣāt kañcit utkarṣaviśeṣa avadhāraṇe kāraṇam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:407: udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakāḥ santaḥ phalahetavo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:408: tathā ca 'iyamevargagniḥ sāma'(chā. 1.6.1) iti atra 'tadetadetasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1) iti ṛkśabdena pṛthivīṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:409: nirdiśati sāmaśabdena agniṃ tat ca pṛthivi agnyoḥ rṛk sāmadṛṣṭicīkīrṣāyām avakalpate na ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivi agnidṛṣṭi cikīrṣāyām /
GSP33brssgo4u:410: kṣattari hi rājadṛṣṭikaraṇāt rājaśabda upacaryate na rājani kṣattṛśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:411: api ca 'lokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.2.1) iti adhikaraṇanirdeśāt lokeṣu sāma adhyasitavyam iti pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:412: 'etadgāyatraṃ prāṇeṣu protam' (chā. 2.11.1) iti ca etadevaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:413: prathamanirdiṣṭeṣu ca ādityādiṣu caramanirdiṣṭaṃ brahma adhyastam 'ādityo
GSP33brssgo4u:417: ataḥ anaṅgeṣu ādityādiṣu aṅgam atinikṣepa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:418: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ādityādimataya eva aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran /
GSP33brssgo4u:420: upapadyate hi evam apūrvasaṃnikarṣāt ādityādimatibhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇeṣu udgīthādiṣu karmasamṛddhiḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:421: 'yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati'
GSP33brssgo4u:423: bhavatu karmasamṛddhiphaleṣu evaṃ, svatantraphaleṣu tu katham 'ya etadevaṃ vidvāṃllokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste' (chā. 2.2.3) ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:424: teṣu api adhikṛta adhikārāt prakṛta apūrvasaṃnikarṣeṇa eva phalakalpanā yuktā godohanādīniyamavat
GSP33brssgo4u:425: phalātmakatvāt ca ādityādīnām udgīthādibhyaḥ karmātmakebhya utkarṣa upapattiḥ ādityādiprāptilakṣaṇaṃ hi karmaphalaṃ śiṣyate śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:428: iti ca udgīthameva upāsyatvena upakramya ādityādimatīḥ vidadhāti /
GSP33brssgo4u:429: yat tu uktam udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmabhūyaṃ bhūtvā phalaṃ kariṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:432: ādityādibhāvena api ca dṛśyamānānām udgīthādīnāṃ karmātmakatvān apāyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:433: 'tadetadetasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1) iti tu lākṣaṇika eva pṛthivī agnyoḥ ṛk sāmaśabdaprayogaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:434: lakṣaṇā ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭena viprakṛṣṭena vā svārthasaṃbandhena pravartate /
GSP33brssgo4u:435: tatra yadi api ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivī agnyoḥ ca saṃnidhānayoreva eṣa ṛk sāmaśabdaprayoga ṛk sāmasaṃbandhāt iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:436: kṣattṛśabdaḥapi hi kutaścit kāraṇāt rājānam upasarpan na nivārayituṃ pāryate /
GSP33brssgo4u:437: 'iyamevarka'(chā. 1.6.1) iti ca yathā akṣaranyāsam ṛca eva pṛthivītvam avadhārayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:438: pṛthivyā hi aktve avadhāryamāṇa iyam ṛk eva ityakṣaranyāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:439: 'ya evaṃ vidvānsāma gāyati' (chā. 1.7.7) iti ca aṅgāśrayameva vijñānam upasaṃharati na pṛthivyādi āśrayam /
GSP33brssgo4u:440: tathā 'lokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.2.1) iti yadi api
GSP33brssgo4u:441: saptamīnirdiṣṭā lokāḥ tathāpi sāmnyeva te adhyasyeran dvitīyānirdeśena sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt
GSP33brssgo4u:442: sāmani hi lokeṣu adhyasyamāneṣu sāma lokātmana upāsitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:443: anyathā punaḥ lokāḥ sāmā ātmana upāsitāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:445: yatra api tulyo dvitīyanirdeśaḥ - 'atha khalvamumādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.9.1) iti, tatra api 'samastasya khalu sāmna upāsanaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:447: saptavidhasya' (chā. 2.8.1) iti ca sāmna eva upāsyatva upakramāt tasmin eva ādityādi adhyāsaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:448: etasmāt eva ca sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt 'pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ' (chā. 2.2.1)
GSP33brssgo4u:449: ityādinirdeśaviparyaye api hiṅkārādiṣu eva pṛthivyādi dṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:450: tasmāt anaṅgāśrayā ādityādimatayaḥ aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran iti siddham // 6 //
GSP33brssgo4u:453: tairevādiriti upadrava iti ca bhaktidvayādhikaiḥ saptāṃśa sāmeti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:457: siddharūpādityādibhyaḥ karmarūpodgīthādīnāṃ phalasaṃnikarṣeṇotkarṣādbrahmavadviśeṣaṇatve niyama iti dṛṣṭāntena mukhyaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo4u:462: dhyānaṃ vihitaṃ, tatra yadi ṛksāmātmakayoḥ karmāṅgayoḥ pṛthivyagnidṛṣṭhiḥ syāt, tadā pṛthivyagnyorṛksāmapadaprayogo
GSP33brssgo4u:469: upāstīnāṃ hi karmasamṛddhiḥ phalaṃ śrūyate, sā ca tābhiraṅgeṣu
GSP33brssgo4u:471: nanu yatropāstīnāṃ prakṛtakarmāpūrvasaṃnikṛṣṭāṅgadvārāpekṣaṃ phalaṃ śrutaṃ tatra phalopapattaye 'ṅgānāmupāsyatvaṃ bhavatu tadanapekṣalokādiphaleṣu tūpāsaneṣu kathamupāsyaviveka iti śaṅkate-bhavatviti /
GSP33brssgo4u:472: yathā svatantrapaśuphalasyāpi godohanasya aṅgadvārāpekṣayaiva phalamiṣṭaṃ tadvallokādiphaleṣūpāsaneṣvapi karmāpūrvāṅgadvāraiva phalakalpanā yuktā, karmādhikṛtasyaivāṅgāśritopāsaneṣvadhikārāt, ato
GSP33brssgo4u:479: siddhādityādyātmanā karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭau karmatvahāniḥ syādityata āha-ādityādibhāveneti /
GSP33brssgo4u:485: dṛṣṭā, tathā cātra ṛksāmayoḥ pṛthivyāgnidṛṣṭipakṣe 'pi ṛksāmapadābhyāṃ svavācyārthe draṣṭavyatākhyaparamparāsaṃbandhena pṛthivyagnilakṣaṇā yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:486: nanu pratīkavācipadasya dhyeye arthe lakṣaṇā na yuktā, kṣatṛpadasya rājanyaprayogāditi śaṅkate-tatra yadyapīti /
GSP33brssgo4u:487: tathāpi ṛksāmasaṃbandhātpṛthivyagnyorevaitasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāmeti mukhyayoḥ pṛthaguktestadetasyāmityatrāpi tayorgrahe punaruktiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo4u:488: ataḥ pratīkābhedadṛṣṭyā pṛthivyagnyoḥ pratīkasaṃnidhānāttayoreva pratīkapadaprayogaḥ kṛtastabhedadārḍhyāyetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:490: sthitaprayogasya nimittaṃ kimapi vācyaṃ na tu nimittamastīti prayoga āpādya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:491: kṣattā sūtaḥ, tasya kāryaṃ rathacaryādi yadā rājeva karoti tadā kṣattṛśabdo rājanyapyastītyakṣarārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:494: sāmātmanā lokānupāsīteti dvitīyāsaptamyorbhaṅgastvayā kāryastato varaṃ lokātmanā sāmopāsīteti saptamīmātrabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:495: eteneti ekavibhaktibhaṅgalāghavena prāṇātmanā gāyatraṃ sāmopāsyamiti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:499: pañcavidhasyopāsanam'ityupasaṃhṛtya, atheti saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanaṃ prakramya prapañcitamataḥ sāmna evopāsyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:501: yadyapi hiṅkāroddeśena pṛthivītvavidheruddeśyasya prathamanirdeśo vācyastathāpyuktanyāyabalādvyatyayo grāhya ityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo4u:507: karmāṅgasaṃbaddheṣu tāvat upāsaneṣu karmatantratvāt na āsanādicintā na api samyak darśane vastutantratvāt vijñānasya /
GSP33brssgo4u:508: itareṣu tu upāsaneṣu kim aniyamena tiṣṭhan āsīnaḥ śayāno vā pravarteta uta niyamena āsīna eva iti cintayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:509: tatra mānasatvāt upāsanasya aniyamaḥ śarīrasthiteḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:510: evaṃ prāpte bravīti - āsīna eva upāsīta iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:512: upāsanaṃ nāma samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇaṃ na ca tat gacchato dhāvato vā saṃbhavati gatyādīnāṃ cittavikṣepakatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:513: tiṣṭhataḥ api dehadhāraṇe vyāpṛtaṃ mano na sūkṣmavastunirīkṣaṇakṣamaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:514: śayānasya api akasmāt eva nidrayā abhibhūyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:515: āsīnasya tu evañjātīyako bhūyān doṣaḥ suparihara iti saṃbhavati tasya upāsanam // 7 //
GSP33brssgo4u:517: karmaṇa utthitenopaviṣṭena vānekadhānuṣṭhānadarśanātsaṃśayaḥ karmāṅgāśritopāsanānāmāsananiyamānapekṣāṇāmanuṣṭhānaprakāra uktastadvadaṅgānāśritopāsaneṣvapyaniyama iti pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo4u:525: api ca dhyāyati arthaṃ eṣa yat samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇam /
GSP33brssgo4u:526: dhyāyatiḥ ca praśithila aṅgaceṣṭeṣu pratiṣṭhitadṛṣṭiṣu ekaviṣaya ākṣiptacitteṣu upacaryamāṇo dṛśyate dhyāyati bako dhyāyati proṣitabandhuḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:533: api ca 'dhyāyatīva pṛthivī' (chā. 7.6.1) iti atra pṛthivyādiṣu
GSP33brssgo4u:534: acalatvameva apekṣya dhyāyativādo bhavati tat ca liṅgam upāsanasya āsīnakarmatve // 9 //
GSP33brssgo4u:539: smaranti api ca śiṣṭā upāsana aṅgatvena āsanam - 'śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiramāsanamātmanaḥ' (gī. 6.11) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:540: ata eva padmakādīnām āsanaviśeṣāṇām upadeśo yogaśāstre // 10 //
GSP33brssgo4u:541: brahmasya śārīrasya cāsanasya smaraṇānniyama ityāha-smaranti ceti //10//
GSP33brssgo4u:547: dik deśakāleṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim asti kaścit niyamo na asti vā iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:548: prāyeṇa vaidikeṣu ārambheṣu digādiniyamadarśanāt syāt iha api kaścit niyama iti yasya matiḥ taṃ prati āha dik deśakāleṣu arthalakṣaṇa eva niyamaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:549: yatra eva asya diśi deśe kāle vā manasaḥ sokaryeṇa ekāgratā bhavati tatra eva upāsīta prācīdik pūrvāhna prācīna pravaṇādivat viśeṣa aśrāvaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:551: nanu viśeṣam api kecit āmananti - 'same śucau kharkarāvahnivālukāvivarjite śabdajalāśrayādibhiḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:552: manonukūle natu cakṣupīḍane guhānivātāśrayaṇe prayojayet' (śve. 2.10) iti yathā iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:554: sati tu etasmin tadgateṣu viśeṣaniyama iti suhṛt bhūtvā ācārya ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo4u:555: 'manonukūle' iti ca eṣā śrutiḥ yatra ekāgratā tatra eva iti etat eva darśayati // 11 //
GSP33brssgo4u:557: teṣvevāṅgānāśritopāsaneṣu prācyādidiśi tīrthādideśe pradoṣādikāle niyamo 'sti na vetyubhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśayaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:558: ekaviṣayatvaṃ saṃgatirūpāstīnāṃ vihitatvādyāgādivadasti digādiniyama iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:563: prācīnapravaṇe prāgdeśe nimnasthāne vaiśvadevaṃ kuryāditivadatra digādiviśeṣo na śrūyate ato 'numānamaprayojakamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:568: vācanikaṃ samadeśādiniyamamaṅgīkṛtya cittaikāgryaviruddheṣu deśādigateṣu prācīnapravaṇatvādiṣvanādara iti suhṛdbhāvena sūtrakṛdupadiśati /
GSP33brssgo4u:575: āvṛttiḥ sarva upāsaneṣu ādartavya iti sthitam ādye adhikaraṇe /
GSP33brssgo4u:576: tatra yāni tāvat samyak darśanārthāni upāsanāni tāni avaghātādivat kāryaparyavasānāni iti jñātameva eṣām āvṛttiparimāṇam /
GSP33brssgo4u:577: na hi samyak darśane kārye niṣpanne yatnāntaraṃ kiñcit śāsituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:579: yāni punaḥ abhyudayaphalāni teṣu eṣā cintā kiṃ kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam āvartya uparamet uta yāvajjīvam āvartayet iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:581: kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam abhyasya utsṛjet āvṛttiviśiṣṭasya upāsanaśabdārthasya kṛtatvāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:582: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - āprāyaṇāt eva āvartayet pratyayam /
GSP33brssgo4u:584: karmāṇi api hi janmāntara upabhogyaṃ phalam ārabhamāṇāni tat anurūpaṃ bhāvanāvijñānaṃ prāyaṇakāla ākṣipanti, 'savijñāno bhavati
GSP33brssgo4u:585: savijñānamevānvavakrāmati' 'yaccittastenaiṣa prāṇamāyāti, prāṇastejasā yuktaḥ sahātmanā yathāsaṃkalpitaṃ lokaṃ nayati' iti ca evamādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:587: pratyayāḥ tu ete svarūpa anuvṛttiṃ muktvā kim anyat prāyaṇakālabhāvi bhāvanāvijñānam apekṣeran
GSP33brssgo4u:588: tasmāt ye pratipattavyaphalabhāvanātmakāḥ pratyayaḥ teṣu aprāyaṇāt āvṛttiḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:589: tathā ca śrutiḥ -'sa yāvatkraturayamasmāllokātpraiti' iti prāyaṇakāle api
GSP33brssgo4u:591: smṛtiḥ api - 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssgo4u:592: taṃ tamevaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ' (gī. 8.6) iti 'prayāṇakāle
GSP33brssgo4u:594: 'so 'ntavelāyāmetattrayaṃ pratipadyeta' iti ca maraṇavelāyām api kartavyaśeṣaṃ śrāvayati // āprāyaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:600: upāstīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ cāntyakāle prāptavyaphalasphūrtidvārā phalahetutve mānamāha-savijñāna iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:601: bhāvanāmayaṃ vijñānaṃ phalasphuraṇaṃ tena sahitaḥ savijñāno vijñānasphuritaphalaṃ vijñānamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:602: yasmiṃlloke cittaṃ saṃkalpo 'syeti yaccittastena saṃkalpitena lokena
GSP33brssgo4u:603: saha phalasphūrtyanantaraṃ manaḥ prāṇe līyate iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo4u:607: astvidamantyaphalaṃ vijñānaṃ karmaṇamivādṛṣṭadvāropāstīnāṃ tataḥ kuta āmaraṇamāvṛttirityata āha-pratyayāstviti /
GSP33brssgo4u:620: atha idānīṃ brahmavidyāphalaṃ prati cintā pratāyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:621: brahma adhigame sati tat viparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyate vā iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:623: phalārthatvāt karmaṇaḥ phalam adatvā na saṃbhāvyate kṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:624: phaladāyinī hi asya śaktiḥ śrutyā samadhigatā /
GSP33brssgo4u:625: yadi tadantareṇa eva phala upabhogam apavṛjyeta śrutiḥ kadarthitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:627: nanu evaṃ sati prāyaścitta upadeśaḥanarthakaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo4u:630: api ca prāyaścittānāṃ doṣasaṃyogena vidānāt bhavet api doṣakṣapaṇārthatā na tu evaṃ brahmavidyāyāṃ vidhānam asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:631: nanu anabhyupagamyamāne brahmavidaḥ karmakṣaye tatphalasya avaśyaṃ bhoktavyatāvāt anirmokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:634: tasmāt na brahma adhigame duritanivṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:635: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- tat adhigame brahma adhigame sati uttarapūrvayoḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:636: aghayoḥ aśleṣavināśau bhavataḥ uttarasya aśleṣaḥ pūrvasya vināśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:639: tathā hi brahmavidyā prakriyāyāṃ saṃbhāvyamānasaṃbandhasya āgāmino duritasya anabhisaṃbandhaṃ viduṣo vyapadiśati - 'yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā.4.14.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:640: tathā vināśam api pūrva ucitasya duritasya vyapadiśati -
GSP33brssgo4u:641: 'tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante' (chā. 5.24.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:644: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:645: yat uktam anupabhuktaphalasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayakalpanāyāṃ śāstraṃ kadarthitaṃ syāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:647: na hi vayaṃ karmaṇaḥ phaladāyinīṃ śaktim avajānīmahe, vidyata eva sā, sā tu vidyādinā kāraṇāntareṇa pratibadhyata iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:648: śaktisadbhāvamātre ca śāstraṃ vyāpriyate na pratibandha apratibandhayoḥ api /
GSP33brssgo4u:649: na hi karma kṣīyata iti etat api smaraṇam autsargikaṃ na bhogāt ṛte karma kṣīyata tadarthatvāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:650: iṣyata eva tu prāyaścittādinā tasya kṣayaḥ 'sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati'
GSP33brssgo4u:651: 'tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainameva vada' ityādi śrutismṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:652: yat tu uktaṃ naimittikāni prāyaścittāni bhaviṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:654: doṣasaṃyogena codyamānānām eṣāṃ doṣanirghātaphalasaṃbhave phalāntarakalpanā anupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:655: yatpunaḥ etat uktaṃ na prāyaścittavat doṣakṣaya uddeśena vidyāvidānam asti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:656: atra brūmaḥ - saguṇāsu tāvat vidyāsu vidyata eva vidhānam /
GSP33brssgo4u:657: tāsu ca vākyaśeṣa aiśvaryaprāptiḥ pāpanivṛttiḥ ca vidyāvata ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:658: tayoḥ ca avivakṣākāraṇaṃ na asti iti ataḥ pāpmaprahāṇapūrvaka aiśvaryaprāptiḥ tāsāṃ phalam iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:659: nirguṇāyāṃ tu vidyāyāṃ yadi api vidhānaṃ na asti tathā api akartṛ ātmatvabodhāt karmapradāhasiddhiḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:660: aśleṣa iti ca āgāmiṣu karmasu kartṛtvameva na pratipadyate brahmavit iti darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:661: atikrānteṣu tu yadi api mithyājñānāt kartṛtvaṃ pratipeda iva tathā api vidyāsāmarthyāt mithyājñānanivṛtteḥ tāni api pravilīyanta iti āha vināśa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:662: pūrvasiddhakartṛtva bhoktṛtva viparītaṃ hi triṣu api kāleṣu akartṛtva abhoktṛtvasvarūpaṃ brahma aham asmi na itaḥ pūrvam api kartā bhoktā vā aham āsaṃ na idānīṃ na api bhaviṣyatkāla iti brahmavit avagacchati /
GSP33brssgo4u:664: anyathā hi anādikālapravṛttānāṃ karmāṇāṃ kṣayābhāve mokṣa abhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:665: na ca deśakālanimittāpekṣo mokṣaḥ karmaphalavat bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:668: tasmāt brahma adhigame duritakṣaya iti sthiram // 13 //
GSP33brssgo4u:669: yathopāsakānāṃ yāvajjīvaṃ kartavyamasti na tathātmavidāmiti karmakṣayalakṣaṇāṃ jīvanmuktimāha-tadadhigama iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:671: saṃprati phalādhyāyasthā phalacintā kriyata ityāha-gata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:672: karmaṇāṃ phalāntatvaśāstrājjñānanāśyatvaśāstrācca saṃśayaḥ, pūrvapakṣe jñānino 'pi saṃcitapāpabhogānantaraṃ muktiḥ, siddhānte tu jñānasamakālaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:676: ataḥ phalāntameva pāpaṃ na madhye naśyatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:677: nanu tarhi tannāśārthaṃ prāyaścittavidhirna syāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:679: yathā āhitāgnergṛhadāhe nimitte sati 'agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet'iti iṣṭividhistadvaddoṣe nimittamātre sati
GSP33brssgo4u:681: nanu viṣama upanyāsaḥ, yuktaṃ gṛhadāhasya siddhatvādayogyatvāccāphalatayā nimittamātratvaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:682: kuryādityatra tu malinaḥ snāyāditivaddoṣapadasya nivṛttidvārā phalaparatvasaṃbhavāt 'tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate'iti
GSP33brssgo4u:692: vidhiniṣedhaśāstraṃ 'nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate'ityādi, smṛtiśca karmaṇaḥ phalaśaktau pramāṇamataḥ śaktasyāpi kutaścinnāśāṅgīkāreṇa śāstravirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:706: pūrvasmin adhikaraṇe bandhahetoḥ aghasya svābhāvikasya aśleṣavināśau jñānanimittau śāstravyapadeśāt nirūpitau /
GSP33brssgo4u:707: dharmasya punaḥ śāstrīyatvāt śāstrīyeṇa jñānena avirodha iti āśaṅkya tat nirākaraṇāya pūrva adhikaraṇanyāya atideśaḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:708: itarasya api puṇyasya karmaṇa evam aghavat asaṃśleṣo vināśaḥ ca jñānavato bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:710: 'ubhe u haivaiṣa ete tarati' (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādiśrutiṣu ca duṣkṛtavat
GSP33brssgo4u:712: akartṛ ātmatvabodhanimittasya ca karmakṣayasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ tulyatvāt
GSP33brssgo4u:714: yatra api kevala eva pāpmaśabdo dṛśyate tatra api tena eva puṇyam api akalitam iti draṣṭavyam
GSP33brssgo4u:716: asti ca śrutau puṇye api pāpmaśabdaḥ 'nainaṃ setumahorātre tarataḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssgo4u:717: 8.4.1) iti atra saha duṣkṛtena sakṛtamapi anukramya sarve pāpmānaḥ ato
GSP33brssgo4u:718: nivartanta iti aviśeṣeṇa eva prakṛte puṇye pāpmaśabdaprayogāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:719: pāte tu iti tu śabdaḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:720: evaṃ dharma adharmayoḥ bandhahetvoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt aśleṣavināśasiddheḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī viduṣaḥ śarīrapāte muktiḥ iti avadhārayati // 14//
GSP33brssgo4u:723: jñānātpuṇyaṃ kṣīyate na veti pūrvavatsaṃdehe jñānaṃ tu na puṇyanāśakaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:727: nanu kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutiḥ pāpaviṣayā sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ taratīti viśeṣaśruterityata āha-yatrāpi kevala iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:734: pūrvayoḥ adhikaraṇayoḥ jñānanimittaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vināśaḥ avadhāritaḥ sa kim aviśeṣeṇa ārabdhakāryayoḥ anārabdhakāryayoḥ ca bhavati uta viśeṣeṇa anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva iti vicāryate 'tatra ubhe u haivaiṣa ete tarati' (bṛ. 4.4.22) iti evamādiśrutiṣu aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva kṣaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:735: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - anārabdhakārye eva tu iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:736: apravṛttaphale eva pūrve janmāntarasaṃcite asmin api ca janmani prāk jñāna utpatteḥ saṃcite sukṛtaduṣkṛte jñāna adhigamāt kṣīyete na tu ārabdhakārye sāmibhuktaphale yābhyām etat brahmajñāna āyatanaṃ janma nirmitam /
GSP33brssgo4u:737: kuta etat - 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā.
GSP33brssgo4u:739: itarathā hi jñānāt aśeṣakarmakṣaye sati sthitihetu abhāvāt jñānaprāpti anantarameva kṣemamśnu avīta, tatra śarīrapātapratīkṣāṃ na ācakṣīta /
GSP33brssgo4u:740: nanu vastubalena eva ayam akartṛ ātmāvabodhaḥ karmāṇi kṣapayan kathaṃ kānicit kṣapayet kānicit ca upekṣeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:741: na hi samāne agnibījasaṃparke keṣāñcit bījaśaktiḥ kṣīyate keṣāñcit na kṣīyata iti śakyam aṅgīkartum iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:742: ucyate - na tāvat anāśritya ārabdhakāryaṃ karmāśayaṃ jñāna utpattiḥ upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:743: āśrite ca tasmin kulālacakravat pravṛttavegasya antarāle pratibandha asaṃbhavāt bhavati vegakṣayapratipālanam
GSP33brssgo4u:744: akartṛ ātmabodhaḥ api hi mithyājñānabādhanena karmāṇi ucchinatti /
GSP33brssgo4u:745: bādhitam api tu mithyājñānaṃ dvicandrajñānavat saṃskāravaśāt kañcitkālam anuvartata eva /
GSP33brssgo4u:746: api ca na eva atra vivaditavyaṃ brahmavidā kañcitkālaṃ śarīraṃ dhriyate na vā dhriyata iti
GSP33brssgo4u:747: kathaṃ hi ekasya svahṛdayapratyayaṃ brahmavedanaṃ dehadhāraṇaṃ ca apareṇa pratikṣeptuṃ śakyeta
GSP33brssgo4u:749: tasmāt anārabdhakāryayoḥ eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ vidyāsāmarthyāt kṣaya iti nirṇayaḥ // 15 //

GSP33brssgo4u:814: (chā. 1.1.10) ityādivacanebhyo vidyāsaṃyuktam asti kevalam api asti /
GSP33brssgo4u:815: tatra idaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ vidyāsaṃyuktameva agnihotrādikaṃ karma mumukṣoḥ vidyāhetutvena tayā saha ekakāryatvaṃ pratipadyate na kevalam uta vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ kevalaṃ ca aviśeṣeṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:816: kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ - 'tametamātmānaṃ yajñena vividiṣanti' iti yajñādīnāmvi aśeṣeṇa ātmavedanāṅgatvena śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:818: kiṃ tāvat prāptaṃ vidyāsaṃyuktam eva karmāgnihotrādi ātmavidyāśeṣatvaṃ pratipadyate na vidyāhīnam
GSP33brssgo4u:825: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate - yadeva vidyayā iti hi /
GSP33brssgo4u:827: vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ karmāgnihotrādikaṃ vidyāvihīnāt karmaṇaḥ agnihotrāt viśiṣṭaṃ vidvāniva brāhmaṇo vidyāvihīnāt brāhmaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:828: tathā api na atyantam anapekṣaṃ vidyāvihīnaṃ karmāgnihotrādikam /

GSP33brssgo4u:831: nanu vidyāsaṃyuktasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyāvihīnāt viśiṣṭatva avagamāt vidyāvihīnam agnihotrādi ātmavidyāhetutvena anapekṣameva iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:833: vidyāsahāyasya agnihotrādeḥ vidyānimittena sāmarthya atiśayena yogāt ātmajñānaṃ prati kaścit kāraṇa atiśayo bhaviṣyati na tathā vidyāvihīnasya iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssgo4u:834: natu 'yajñena vividiṣanti' iti atra aviśeṣeṇa ātmajñānāṅgatvena śrutasya agnihotrādeḥ anaṅgatvaṃ śakyam abhyupagantum /

GSP33brssgo4u:854: tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chāndo. 6.14.2) iti

GSP33brssgo4u:937: punarbhavamindriyairmanasi saṃpadyamānaiḥ' (praśna. 3.9) iti atra aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eva indriyāṇāṃ manasi saṃpattiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:938: tatra api ata eva vāca iva cakṣurādīnām api savṛttike manasi avasthite vṛttilopadarśanāt tattvapralaya asaṃbhavāt śabda upapatteḥ ca vṛttidvāreṇa eva sarvāṇi indriyāṇi manaḥ anuvartante /
