GSP33brssgo4u:949: samadhigatametat 'vāṅmanasi saṃpadyate' (chā. 6.8.6) iti atra vṛttisaṃpattivivakṣa iti
GSP33brssgo4u:950: atha yat uttaravākyam 'manaḥ prāṇe' (chā. 6.8.6) iti kim atra api vṛttisaṃpattiḥ eva vivakṣyata uta vṛttimat saṃpattiḥ iti vicikitsāyāṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:951: vṛttimat saṃpattiḥ eva atra iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:952: śruti anugrahāt tat prakṛtikatva upapatteḥ ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:953: tathā hi - 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥprāṇaḥ' (chā. 6.5.4) iti annayoni mana ātmananti ap yoniṃ ca prāṇam /
GSP33brssgo4u:955: ata- ca yat manaḥ prāṇe prakṛtivikāra abhedāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:956: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tat api agṛhīta bāhya indriyavṛtti mano vṛttidvāreṇa eva prāṇe pralīyate iti uttarāt vākyāt avagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:957: tathā hi suṣupso- mumūrṣoḥ ca prāṇavṛttau parispanda ātmikāyām avasthitāyāṃ manovṛttīnām upaśamo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:958: na ca manasaḥ svarūpa apyayaḥ prāṇe saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:962: na hi īdṛśena prāṇāḍikena tat prakṛtitvena manaḥ prāṇe saṃpattum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:963: evam api hi anne manaḥ saṃpadyeta apsu ca annam apsu eva ca prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:964: na hi etasmin api pakṣe prāṇabhāvapariṇatābhyaḥ adbhyo mano jāyata iti kiñcana pramāṇam asti tasmāt na manasaḥ prāṇe svarūpa apyayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:965: vṛtti apyaye api tu śabdaḥ avakalpate vṛttivattimatoḥ abheda upacārāt iti darśitam // 3 //
GSP33brssgo4u:969: kṛtaḥ iha tvabātmakaprāṇasya annātmakamanaḥprakṛtitvena prakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugrahānna manaḥśrutirbādhyeti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ pūrvavat, siddhāntastvabannayoḥ prakṛtivikṛtibhāve 'pi na tadvikārayoḥ prāṇamanasostadbhāvo himaghaṭayorapi tadbhāvaprasaṅgādato
GSP33brssgo4u:971: āgṛhītā bāhyendriyavṛttayo yena tattathā līnendriyavṛttikaṃ mano 'pi
GSP33brssgo4u:981: sthitam etat yasya yato na utpattiḥ tasya tasmin vṛttipralayo na svarūpapralaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:982: idam idānīṃ prāṇaḥ tejasi iti atra cintyate -
GSP33brssgo4u:983: kiṃ yathāśruti prāṇasya tejasi eva vṛtti upasaṃhāraḥ kiṃvā deha indriyapañjara adhyakṣe jīva iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:984: tatra śruteḥ anatiśaṅkyatvāt prāṇasya tejasi eva saṃpattiḥ syāt aśrutakalpanāyā anyāyyatvāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:985: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate saḥ adhyakṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:986: sa prakṛtaḥ prāṇaḥ adhyakṣe avidyākarmapūrvaprajña upādhike vijñāna ātmani avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:987: tat pradhānā prāṇavṛttiḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:989: evam eva imam ātmānam antakāle sarve prāṇā abhisāmayanti yatra etat ūrdhva ucchvāsī bhavati iti hi śrutyantaram adhyakṣa upagāminaḥ sarvān prāṇān aviśeṣeṇa darśayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:990: viśeṣeṇa ca 'tamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmati' (bṛ. 4.4.2) iti pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya adhyakṣa anugāmitāṃ darśayati tat anuvṛttitāṃ ca itareṣām /
GSP33brssgo4u:992: 'savijñāno bhavati' iti ca adhyakṣasya antarvijñānavattva pradarśanena tasmin apītakaraṇagrāmasya prāṇasya avasthānaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:993: nanu prāṇaḥ tejasi iti śrūyate kathaṃ prāṇaḥ adhyakṣa iti adhikāvāpaḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:995: adhyakṣapradhānatvāt utkramaṇādivyavahārasya śrutyantaragatasya api ca viśeṣasya apekṣaṇīyatvāt so 'dhyakṣe tadupagamādibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:997: śruterūpagamādiśruteśca saṃśayamuktvā jīve layaṃ vināpi upagamādisaṃbhava iti pūrvapakṣayati-sthitamityādinā
GSP33brssgo4u:998: atra tejaḥśabdasya mukhyatvaṃ, siddhānte tu bhūtopahita
GSP33brssgo4u:999: jīvalakṣakatvamiti matvā sūtraṃ yojayati-sa prakṛta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1001: taṃ jīvaṃ prati prāṇānāmupagamānugamanāvasthānaśrutibhya iti hetvarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1002: yathā yātrecchāvantaṃ rājānaṃ bhṛtyā upagacchantyevameva paralokaṃ jigamiṣuṃ jīvaṃ sarve prāṇā abhimukhyenāyāntītyupagamaḥ śrutaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1005: jīvasya prāptavyaphalāvagamāya hi vijñānasāhityaśrutyāḥ mukhyaprāṇasahitakaraṇānāṃ jīve sthitirbhātītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1008: kathaṃ tarhi prāṇaḥ tejasi iti śrutiḥ iti ata āha -
GSP33brssgo4u:1010: sa prāṇasaṃpṛktaḥ adhyakṣaḥ tejaḥsahacariteṣu bhūteṣu dehabījabhūteṣu sūkṣmeṣu avatiṣṭhata iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1012: nanu ca iyaṃ śrutiḥ prāṇasya tejasi sthitiṃ darśayati na prāṇasaṃpṛktasya adhyakṣasya /
GSP33brssgo4u:1014: saḥ adhyakṣa iti adhyakṣasya api antarāle api upasaṃkhyātatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1015: yaḥ api hi srughnānmathurāṃ gatvā mathurāyāḥ pāṭaliputraṃ vrajati saḥ api srughnātpāṭaliputraṃ yāti iti śakyate vaditum /
GSP33brssgo4u:1016: tasmāt prāṇaḥ tejasi iti prāṇasaṃpṛktasya adhyakṣasya eva etat tejaḥ sahacariteṣu bhūteṣu avasthānam // 5 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1017: yadyapi prāṇasya tejasyavyavadhānena layaḥ śrutastathāpyubhayaśrutyanugrahāya prāṇo jīve līyate, jīvadvārā ca tadupādhiṣu tejaādibhūteṣviti śrutyarthasphuṭīkaraṇārthaṃ sūtraṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1019: naca layaṃ vināpi jīvaṃ pratyipagamādisaṃbhavāttejaḥ śrutirmukhyāstviti
GSP33brssgo4u:1020: vācyaṃ, jīvaṃ pratyāgatya prāṇasya nirvyāpāratvena sthiterevātra layatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1026: kathaṃ tejaḥsahacariteṣu bhūteṣu iti ucyate yāvat ekameva śrūyate prāṇaḥ tejasi iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1029: na ekasmin eva tejasi śarīrāntaraprepsāvelāyāṃ jīvaḥ avatiṣṭhate kāryasya śarīrasya anekātmakatvadarśanāt
GSP33brssgo4u:1030: darśayataḥ ca etam arthaṃ praśnaprativacane 'āpaḥ puruṣavacasaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssgo4u:1035: smṛtiḥ api 'aṇvyo mātrāvināśinyo daśārdhānāṃ tu yāḥsmṛtāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1037: nanu ca upasaṃhṛteṣu vāk ādiṣu karaṇeṣu śarīrāntaraprepsāvelāyāṃ 'kvāyaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1038: tadā puruṣo bhavati' (bṛ. 3.2.13) iti upakramya śrutyantaraṃ karmāśrayatāṃ nirūpayati - 'tau ha yadūcatuḥ karma haiva tadūcaturatha ha
GSP33brssgo4u:1040: atra ucyate - tatra karmaprayuktasya graha atigrahasaṃjñakastha indriyaviṣayātmakasya bandhanasya pravṛttiḥ iti karmāśrayatā uktā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1041: iha punaḥ bhūta upādānāt dehāntara utpattiḥ iti bhūtāśrayatvam uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1042: praśaṃsāśabdāt api tatra prādhānyamātraṃ karmaṇaḥ pradarśitaṃ na tu āśrayāntaraṃ nivāritam
GSP33brssgo4u:1044: FN: daśārdhānāṃ pañcabhūtānāṃ , aṇvyaḥ sūkṣmāḥ , mīyanta iti mātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1046: aṇvyaḥ sūkṣmāḥ, mīyanta iti mātrāḥ paricchinnāḥ, prāṅmokṣādavināśinyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1047: daśārdhānāṃ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ sūkṣmabhāgā iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo4u:1056: sā iyam utkrāntiḥ kiṃ vidvat aviduṣoḥ samānā kiṃvā viśeṣavati iti viśayānānāṃ viśeṣavati iti tāvat prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1062: nanu vidyāprakaraṇe samāmnānāt viduṣa eva eṣā bhavet /
GSP33brssgo4u:1065: tathā hi 'yatraitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma' 'aśiśiṣati nāma' 'pipāsati nāma'
GSP33brssgo4u:1066: (chā. 6.8.3,5) iti ca sarvaprāṇisādhāraṇā eva svāpādayaḥ anukīrtyante
GSP33brssgo4u:1067: vidyāprakaraṇe api pratipādayiṣitavastupratipādana anuguṇyena na tu viduṣo viśeṣavanto vidhitsyante
GSP33brssgo4u:1068: evam iyam api utkrāntiḥ mahājanagata eva anukīrtyate yasyāṃ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ puruṣasya prayataḥ tejaḥ saṃpadyate sa ātmā tattvamasi iti etat pratipādayitum /
GSP33brssgo4u:1069: pratiṣiddhā ca eṣā viduṣaḥ 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1071: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - samānā ca eṣa utkrāntiḥ vāk manasi ityādyā vidvat aviduṣoḥ āsṛti upakramāt bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1073: aviruddhān dehabījabhūtāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi āśritya karmaprayukto dehagrahaṇam anubhavituṃ saṃsarati
GSP33brssgo4u:1075: tat etat āsṛti upakramāt iti uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1076: nanu amṛtatvaṃ hi viduṣā prāptavyaṃ na ca tat deśāntara āyattaṃ tatra kṛto bhūta āśrayatvaṃ sṛti upakramo vā iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1077: atra ucyate - anupoṣya ca idam, adagdhvā atyantam avidyādīn kleśān aparavidyāsāmarthyāt āpekṣikam amṛtatvaṃ prepsate saṃbhavati tatra sṛti upakramo bhūta āśrayatvaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:1078: ne hi nirāśrayāṇāṃ prāṇānāṃ gatiḥ upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1080: evaṃ bāhyendriyāṇāṃ manasi prathamaṃ vṛttilayalābhāttato manovṛtteḥ prāṇe layaḥ prāṇavṛtterbhūtopahitajīve laya ityutkrāntivyavasthoktā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1086: tato 'nūtkrānta upāsako muktimaśnuta iti phalaṃ, siddhānte tūtkrānto brahmalokabhāgīti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1089: na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantīti pratiṣedho 'pi tadviṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1091: sṛtirmārgastasyopakramo 'rciḥprāptistataḥ prāktanā utkrāntistulyā, tata upāsako mūrdhanyanāḍīdvārārcirādimārgaṃ prāpnoti nānya iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1093: tadāpekṣikameva na mukhyaṃ 'yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate so 'sya saṃkalpādeva
GSP33brssgo4u:1100: 'tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām' (chā. 6.8.6) iti atra prakaraṇasāmarthyāt tat yathāprakṛtaṃ tejaḥ sādhyakṣaṃ saprāṇaṃ sakaraṇagrāmaṃ bhūtāntarasahitaṃ prayataḥ puṃsaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ saṃpadyata iti etat uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1101: kīdṛśī punaḥ iyaṃ saṃpattiḥ syāt iti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1102: tatra ātyantika eva tāvat svarūpapravilaya iti prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1104: sarvasya hi janimato vastujātasya prakṛtiḥ parā devatā iti pratiṣṭhāpitam
GSP33brssgo4u:1106: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tat teja ādi bhūtasūkṣmaṃ śrotrādikaraṇāśrayabhūtamāpīterā saṃsāramokṣāt samyak jñānanimittāt avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1109: anyathā hi sarvaḥ prāyaṇasamaya eva upādhipratyastamayāt atyantaṃ brahma saṃpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:1110: tatra vidhiśāstram anarthakaṃ syāt vidyāśāstraṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:1111: mithyājñānanimittaḥ ca bandho na samyak jñānāt ṛte visraṃsitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1112: tasmāt tat prakṛtitve api suṣuptapralayavat bījabhāva avaśeṣa eva eṣā saṃtsapattiḥ iti // tadāpīteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1113: pūrvodāhṛtotkrāntivākyaśeṣaṃ vyākhyāya liṅgāśrayapañcabhūtānāṃ kimātyantiko brahmaṇi laya utānātyantika iti layasyobhayathādarśanātsaṃśayamāha-kīdṛśī punariyamiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1114: pūrvatrāpekṣikamamṛtatvamityuktaṃ tadayuktamityākṣepātsaṃgatiḥ pūrvapakṣe mṛtamātrasya muktisiddhiḥ, siddhānte tu karmavidyāśāstrabalātsāvaśeṣalayasiddhiriti vivekaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo4u:1118: tat ca itarabhūtasahitaṃ tejo jīvasya asmāt śarīrāt pravasata āśrayabhūtaṃ svarūpataḥ pramāṇataḥ ca sūkṣmaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1119: tathā hi - nāḍīniṣkramaṇaśravaṇādibhyaḥ asya saukṣmyam upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1122: ata eva ca dehāt nirgacchan pārśvasthaiḥ na upalabhyate // 9 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1123: nanu liṅgātmakasya tejasaḥ kathaṃ sūkṣmatamanāḍīdvārā gatiḥ kuto vā kenacinmūrtena pratighāto nāsti kuto vā na dṛśyata ityata āha-sūkṣmamiti
GSP33brssgo4u:1127: ata eva sūkṣmatvāt na asya sthūlasya śarīrasya upamardena dāhādinimittena itarat sūkṣmaṃ śarīram upapadyate // 10 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1132: asya eva ca sūkṣmasyā śarīrasya eṣa ūṣmā yam etasmin śarīre saṃsparśena ūṣmāṇaṃ vijānanti
GSP33brssgo4u:1133: tathā hi mṛtāvasthāyām avasthite api dehe vidyamāneṣu api ca rūpādiṣu dehaguṇeṣu na ūṣma upalabhyate jīvat avasthāyām eva tu upalabhyata iti ata dehaguṇeṣu na ūṣma upalabhyate jīvat avasthāyām eva tu upalabhyata iti ata upapadyate prasiddhaśarīravyatiriktavyapāśraya eva eṣa ūṣma iti tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'uṣṇa eva jīviṣyañśito mariṣyan iti' // 11 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1140: 'amṛtatvaṃ cānupoṣya' iti ato viśeṣaṇāt ātyantike amṛtatve gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvo abhyupagataḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1141: tatra api kenacit kāraṇena utkrāntim āśaṅkya pratiṣedhati -
GSP33brssgo4u:1142: 'athākāmayamāno yo 'kāmo niṣkāma āptakāma ātmakāmo bhavati na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyeti' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti ataḥ paravidyāviṣayāt
GSP33brssgo4u:1143: pratiṣedhāt na parabrahmavido dehāt prāṇānām utkrāntiḥ asti iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:1145: yataḥ śārīrāt ātmana eṣa utkrāntipratiṣedhaḥ prāṇānāṃ na śarīrāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1146: katham avagamyate 'na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmanti' iti śākhāntare pañcamī
GSP33brssgo4u:1148: saṃbandhasāmānyaviṣayā hi ṣaṣṭhī śākhāntaragatayā pañcamyā saṃbandhaviśeṣe vyavasthāpyate
GSP33brssgo4u:1149: tasmāt iti ca prādhānyāt abhyudayaniḥśreyasa adhikṛto dehī saṃbadhyate na dehaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1151: tasmāt uccikramiṣoḥ jīvāt prāṇā apakrāmanti saha eva tena bhavanti iti arthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1157: ātmakāmatvāt pūrṇānandātmavittvādāptakāmaḥ prāptaparamānandaḥ, ato niṣkāmaḥ anabhivyaktāntaravāsanātmakakāmaśūnyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1159: jñānina utkrāntirasti na veti pañcamīṣaṣṭhīśrutibhyāṃ saṃdehe siddhāntiśaṅkānirāsapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣayati-netyādinā //12//
GSP33brssgo4u:1162: saprāṇasya ca pravasato bhavati utkrāntiḥ dehāt iti evaṃ prāpte prati ucyate -
GSP33brssgo4u:1164: na tat asti yat uktaṃ parabrahmavidaḥ api dehāt asti utkrāntiḥ utkrāntipratiṣedhasya deha upādānatvāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1165: yato deha upādāna eva utkrāntipratiṣedha ekeṣāṃ samāmnātṛṇāṃ spaṣṭa upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1166: tathā hi - ārtabhāgapraśne 'yatrāyaṃ puruṣo mriyata udasmātprāṇāḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1167: krāmantyāho neti' (bṛ. 3.2.11) iti atra 'neti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo4u:1168: 3.211) iti anutkrāntipakṣaṃ parigṛhya na tarhi ayam anutkrānteṣu prāṇeṣu mriyata iti asyām āśaṅkāyām 'atraiva samavanīyanta' iti pravilayaṃ prāṇānāṃ pratijñāya tat siddhaye 'sa ucchvayatyādhyātmāyatyādhmāto mṛtaḥ śete' (bṛ. 3.2.11) iti saśabdaparāmṛṣṭasya prakṛtasya utkrānti avadheḥ ucchvayanādīni samāmananti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1169: dehasya ca etāni syuḥ na dehinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1170: tat sāmānyāt 'na tasmātprāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva samavanīyante' iti atra api
GSP33brssgo4u:1171: abheda upacāreṇa dehāpādānasya eva utkramaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1172: yadi api prādhānyaṃ dehina iti vyākhyeyaṃ yeṣāṃ pañcamī pāṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1173: yeṣāṃ tu ṣaṣṭhīpāṭhaḥ teṣāṃ vidvat saṃbandhini utkrāntiḥ pratiṣidhyata iti prāpta utkrāntipratiṣedhārthatvāt asya vākyasya dehapādāna eva sā pratiṣiddhā bhavati, dehāt utkrāntiḥ prāptā na dehinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1174: api ca 'cakṣuṣo vā mūrdhno vānyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhyastamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmati prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo4u:1175: 4.4.2) iti evam avidvat viṣayaṃ saprapañcam utkramaṇaṃ saṃsāragamanaṃ ca darśayitvā 'iti nu kāmayamānaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti upasaṃhṛtya avidvat kathām
GSP33brssgo4u:1176: 'athākāmayamānaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti vyapadiśya vidvāṃsaṃ yadi tat viṣaye api utkrāntameva prāpadeyasamañjasa eva vyapadeśaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1177: tasmāt avidviṣaye prāptayoḥ gati utkrāntyoḥ vidvat viṣaye pratiṣedha iti evameva vyākhyeyaṃ vyapadeśārthavattvāya /
GSP33brssgo4u:1178: na ca brahmavidaḥ sarvagatabrahmātmabhūtasya prakṣīṇakāmakarmaṇa utkrāntiḥ gatiḥ vā upapadyate nimitta abhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1179: 'atra brahma samaśnute' iti ca evañjātīyakāḥ śrutayo gati utkrāntyoḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1182: smaryate api ca mahābhārate gati utkrāntyoḥ abhāvaḥ -
GSP33brssgo4u:1184: devā api mārge muhyantyapadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1185: nanu gatiḥ iti brahmavidaḥ sarvagatabrahmātmabhūtasya smaryate 'śukaḥ kila vaiyāsakirmumukṣurādityamaṇḍalamabhipratasthe pitrā cānugamyāhūto bho iti
GSP33brssgo4u:1188: saśarīrasya eva ayaṃ yogabalena viśiṣṭadeśaprāptipūrvakaḥ śarīra utsarga iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1190: na hi aśarīraṃ gacchantaṃ sarvabhūtāni draṣṭuṃ śaknuyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1191: tathā ca tatra evaupasaṃhṛtam- 'śukastu mārutācchīghrāṃ gatiṃ kṛtvāntarikṣagaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1195: kāṇvaśrutau tāvattasyeti sarvanāmnā prakṛtaṃ jñāninaṃ parāmṛśya saṃbandhasāmānyamuktaṃ tatra mādhyandinaśākhāyāṃ tasmādityapādānatvarūpaviśeṣa ukto grāhyastathāca jīvātprāṇotkrāntipratiṣedho bhāti na dehāttacchabdena dehasyānuktestasmājjñānino 'pyutkrāntirastīti jñānavaiyarthyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1200: yeṣāṃ pañcamīpāṭhasteṣāṃ yadyapi dehinaḥ prādhānyaṃ tathāpi dehadehinorabhedāttasmāditi dehaṃ parāmṛśya tadāpādana evotkrāntipratiṣedha iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1206: ato vidvatsaṃbandhiprāṇānāmutkrāntyapādānāpekṣāyāṃ cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdhnovetyuktadehapradeśā eva grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1207: tathācāyamarthaḥ-tasya viduṣo bhogopakaraṇātmakāḥ prāṇāḥ dehapradeśebhyo notkrāmantīti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1208: evaṃ ca prāptotkrāntiniṣedhārthatvaṃ vākyasyeti sarvaṃ caturasram /
GSP33brssgo4u:1210: samyagātmabhāvena bhūtāni paśyataḥ apadasya prāpyapadarahitasya padaiṣiṇo devā api mārge muhyanti mārgaṃ na jānanti tadabhāvāditi smṛtiyojanā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1220: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditāni indriyāṇi bhūtāni ca parabrahmavidaḥ tasmin eva parasmin ātmani pralīyante /
GSP33brssgo4u:1222: tathā hi āha śrutiḥ - 'evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśa kalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti (praśna. 6.5) iti.
GSP33brssgo4u:1223: nanu 'gatāḥ kalāḥ pañcadaśa pratiṣṭhāḥ' (mu. 3.2.7) iti vidvat viṣaya eva aparā śrutiḥ parasmāt ātmanaḥ anyatra api kalānāṃ pralayam āha sma /
GSP33brssgo4u:1225: sā khalu vyavahārāpekṣā, pārthivādyāḥ kalāḥ pṛthivyādiḥ eva svaprakṛtīḥ apīyanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1226: itarā tu vidvat pratipatti apekṣā, kṛtsnaṃ kalājātaṃ parabrahmavido brahma eva saṃpadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1229: pūrvatra gatiniṣedhena vidvatkalānāṃ ghrāṇādīnāmatraiva laya uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1230: tamupajīvya sa kiṃ tattatkalāprakṛtiṣu pṛthivyādiṣu syāduta paramātmanīti śrutidvayadarśanātsaṃśayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1231: tatra sākṣātprakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugṛhītayā 'gatāḥ kalāḥ'iti
GSP33brssgo4u:1233: yathā nadyaḥ samudraṃ prāpya līyante evamevāsya paritaḥ sarvatra brahmadraṣṭurimāḥ prāṇaśraddhādyāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣe kalpitāḥ puruṣameva jñeyaṃ prāpya layaṃ gacchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1237: vastugatyā vidvaddṛṣṭyā paramātmani kalālaye 'pi lokadṛṣṭyā pratiṣṭhāsu layoktiraviruddhā
GSP33brssgo4u:1238: tathāca kalāḥ svaprakṛtiṣu vilāpya tābhiḥ saha puruṣe līyante iti śrutidvayatātparyam //15//
GSP33brssgo4u:1244: sa puna- viduṣaḥ kalāpralayaḥ kim itareṣām iva sāvaśeṣo bhavati āhosvit niravaśeṣa iti
GSP33brssgo4u:1245: tatra pralayasāmānyāt śakti avaśeṣatāprasaktau bravīti - avibhāgāpattiḥ eva iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1247: tathā hi kalāpralayam uktvā vakti - 'bhidyate tāsāṃ nāmarūpe puruṣa
GSP33brssgo4u:1248: ityevaṃ procyate sa eṣo 'kalo 'mṛto bhavati' (pra. 6.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1249: avidyā nimittānāṃ ca kalānāṃ na vidyānimitte pralaye sāvaśeṣatva upapattiḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1264: tadokograjvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāt taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogāc ca hārdānugṛhītāḥ śatādhikayā |
GSP33brssgo4u:1267: samānā ca asṛti upakramāt vidvat aviduṣoḥ utkrāntiḥiti uktaṃ tam idānīṃ sati upakramaṃ darśayati
GSP33brssgo4u:1268: tasya upasaṃhṛtavāgādi kalāpasya uccikramiṣato vijñānātmana oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayam 'sa etāstejomātrāḥ samabhyādadāno hṛdayamevānvavakrāmati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1269: tat agraprajvalanapūrvikā cakṣurādisthāna apādānā ca utkrāntiḥ śrūyate -
GSP33brssgo4u:1270: 'tasya haitasya hṛdayasyāgraṃ pradyotate tena pradyotenaiṣa ātmā
GSP33brssgo4u:1271: niṣkrāmati cakṣuṣo vā mūrdhno vānyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhyaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.2)
GSP33brssgo4u:1273: sā kim aniyamena eva vidvat aviduṣoḥ bhavati atha asti kaścit viduṣo viśeṣaniyama iti vicikitsāyāṃ śruti aviśeṣāt aniyamaprāptau ācaṣṭe - samā api hi vidvat aviduṣoḥ hṛdayāgrapradyotane tat prakāśitadvāratve ca
GSP33brssgo4u:1274: mūrdhasthānāt eva vidvān niṣkrāmati sthānāntarebhyaḥ tu itare /
GSP33brssgo4u:1276: yadi vidvān apītaravat yataḥ kutaścit dehadeśāt utkrāmeta na eva utkṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ labheta /
GSP33brssgo4u:1278: tat śeṣagati anusmṛtiyogāt ca vidyāśeṣabhūtā ca mūrdhani anāḍīsaṃbaddhā gatiḥ anuśīlayitavyā vidyāviśeṣeṣu vihitā tām abhyasyan tasya eva pratiṣṭhita iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1279: tasmāt hṛdayālayena brahmaṇā su upāsitena anugṛhītaḥ tadbhāvaṃ samāpanno vidvān mūrdhanyayā eva śatādhikayā śatāt atiriktayā ekaśatatamyā nāḍyā niṣkrāmati itarābhiḥ itare /
GSP33brssgo4u:1280: tathā hi hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti - 'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya
GSP33brssgo4u:1288: tasya hṛdayasyāgraṃ nāḍīmukhaṃ tasya jvalanaṃ bhāviphalasphuraṇaṃ pradyotākhyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1292: atra pūrvapakṣe vidyākṛtātiśayāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1294: yena kenacinmārgeṇa nirgatasyāpi brahmalokaprāptau vidyaśeṣatvena mārgānusmṛtividheḥ kevalādṛṣṭārthatvaṃ syādato 'nvahaṃ smṛtenaiva mārgeṇa gamanaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1297: suṣumnākhyā nāḍī hṛdayāt nirgatā dakṣiṇākṣitālukaṇṭhāntastananāsikāmadhyābhittidvārā brahmarandhraṃ prāptā sūryaraśmibhirekīkṛtā brahmalokamārga upāsakasyeti sthitam //17//
GSP33brssgo4u:1303: asti hārdavidyā - 'atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma'
GSP33brssgo4u:1305: tat prakriyāyām 'atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ' (chā. 8.6.1) iti upakramya saprapañcaṃ nāḍīraśmisaṃbandham uktvā uktam 'atha
GSP33brssgo4u:1309: tasmāt śatādhikayā nāḍyā niṣkrāman raśmi anusārī niṣkrāmati iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1310: tat kiṃm aviśeṣeṇa eva ahani rātrau vā mriyamāṇasya raśmi anusāritvam āhosvit ahani eva iti saṃśaye sati aviśeṣaśravaṇāt aviśeṣeṇa eva tāvat raśmi anusāri iti pratijñāyate // 18 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1313: atha prārabdhānte etadutkramaṇaṃ yadā syādatha tadā etaireva nāḍīsaṃbaddhai raśmibhirutkrāmatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1321: niśi neti cen na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvād darśayati ca |
GSP33brssgo4u:1322: asti ahani nāḍīraśmisaṃbandha iti ahani mṛtasya syāt raśmi anusāritvaṃ rātrau tu pretasya na syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1327: darśayati ca etamarthaṃ śrutiḥ - 'amuṣmādādityātpratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu
GSP33brssgo4u:1328: sṛptā ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminnāditye sṛptāḥ' (chā. 8.6.2)
GSP33brssgo4u:1329: iti nidāghasamaye ca niśāsu api kiraṇa anuvṛttiḥ upalabhyate pratāpādikāryadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1330: stoka anuvṛtteḥ tu durlakṣyatvam ṛtvantararajanīṣu śaiśireṣu iva durdineṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:1332: yadi ca rātrau preto vinā eva raśmi anusāreṇa ūrdhvam ākrameta raśmi anusāra ānarthakyaṃ bhavet
GSP33brssgo4u:1333: na hi etat viśiṣya adhīyate yo divā praiti sa raśmīn apekṣya ūrdvam ākramate yaḥ tu rātrau saḥ anapekṣya eva iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1334: atha tu vidvān api rātriprāyaṇa aparādhamātreṇa na ūrdhvam ākrameta pākṣikaphalā vidyā iti apravṛttiḥ eva tasyāṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1336: atha api rātrau uparataḥ aharāgamam udīkṣeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:1337: aharāgame api asya kadācit araśmisaṃbandhārhaṃ śarīraṃ syāt pāvakādisaṃparkāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1340: tasmāt tat aviśeṣeṇa eva idaṃ rātridivaṃ raśmi anusāritvam // 19 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1342: śirā nāḍyaḥ pratāyante vistṛtā bhavanti sṛptāḥ saṃbaddhāḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1346: kiñca yadi rātrau mṛtasya raśmiyogaṃ vinaivordhvagatiḥ syāttadā raśmiśruterdivāmṛtaviṣayatayā saṃkocaḥ syādūrdhvagatyabhāve ca vidyāyāmapravṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1354: ata eva ca udīkṣā anupapatteḥ apākṣikaphalatvāt ca vidyāyā aniyatakālatvāt ca mṛtyoḥ dakṣiṇa ayane api mriyamāṇo vidvān prāpnoti eva vidyāphalam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1355: uttarāyaṇa maraṇa prāśasti aprasiddherbhīṣmasya ca pratīkṣādarśanāt
GSP33brssgo4u:1357: apekṣitavyam uttarāyaṇam iti imām āśaṅkām anena sūtreṇa apanudati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1360: śruteḥ tu arthaṃ vakṣyati 'ātivāhikāstalliṅgāt' (bra. sū. 4.3.4) iti // 20
GSP33brssgo4u:1361: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyane mṛto vidvānvidyāphalamāpnoti na veti vidyāyā nityavatphalaśruteruttarāyaṇaprāśastyaśāstrācca
GSP33brssgo4u:1370: nanu ca - 'yatra kāle tvanāvṛttimāvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1371: prayātā yānti taṃ phalaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha' (gī. 8.23) iti kālaprādhānyena upakramya aharādikālaviśeṣaḥ smṛtau apunarāvṛttaye
GSP33brssgo4u:1372: niyamitaḥ kathaṃ rātrau dakṣiṇāyane vā prayāto anāvṛttiṃ yāyāditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:1374: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryete smārte caite |
GSP33brssgo4u:1375: yoginaḥ prati ca ayam aharādikālaviniyogaḥ anāvṛttaye smaryate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1376: smārte ca ete yogasāṃkhye na śraute /
GSP33brssgo4u:1377: ato viṣayabhedāt pramāṇāviśeṣāt ca na asya smārtasya kālaviniyogasya śrauteṣu vijñāneṣu avatāraḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1379: 'dhūmo rātristathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam' (gī. 8. 24,25) iti ca śrautau etau devayānapitṛyāṇau pratyabhijñāyete smṛtau api iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1380: ucyate - 'taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi' (gī. 8.23) iti smṛtau kālapratijñānāt
GSP33brssgo4u:1382: yadā punaḥ smṛtau api agnyādyā devatā eva ativāhikyo gṛhyante tadā na kaścit virodha iti // smṛtibalātkālaprādhānyaṃ śaṅkate-nanu ceti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1383: śrautadaharādyupāsakasyāsmābhiḥ kālānapekṣoktā, smārtayogināṃ tu kālāpekṣā smṛtāvucyata ityavirodhamāha-yogina iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1384: yogī daharādyupāsaka eva smṛtyuktaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-smārte ceti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1385: bhagavadārādhanabuddhyānuṣṭhitaṃ karma yogaḥ 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1386: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1392: yadi tu śrautārthapratyabhijñayā kālaśabdo devatāparastarhyaikārthyameveti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1395: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavataḥ kṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye caturthādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1396: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthadhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brssgo4u:1401: atra pāde saguṇavidyāvato mṛtasya uttaramārga abhidhānam
GSP33brssgo4u:1405: āsṛti upakramāt samāna utkrāntiḥ iti uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1411: 'yadā vai puruṣo 'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati' (bṛ. 5.10.1) iti aparā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1412: 'sūryadvāreṇa te virajāḥ prayānti' (muṇḍa, 1.2.11) iti ca aparā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1413: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ parasparaṃ bhinnā etāḥ sṛtaya kiṃ va eka eva
GSP33brssgo4u:1415: tatra prāptaṃ tāvat bhinnāḥ etāḥ sṛtaya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1418: api ca 'athaitaireva raśmibhiḥ'(chā. 8.6.5) iti avadhāraṇam arcirādi
GSP33brssgo4u:1422: tasmāt anyonyabhinnā eva ete panthāna iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1423: evaṃ prāpte abhidadhmahe - arcirādina iti - sarvo brahmaprepsuḥ arcirādina
GSP33brssgo4u:1426: prathito hi eṣa mārgaḥ sarveṣāṃ viduṣām /
GSP33brssgo4u:1427: tathā hi pañcāgnividyāprakaraṇe 'ye 'cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate'
GSP33brssgo4u:1428: (bṛ. 6.2.15) iti vidyāntaraśīlinām api arcirādikā sṛtiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1430: yāsu vidyāsu na kācit gatiḥ ucyate tāsu iyam arcirādika upatiṣṭhatāṃ yāsu tu anyā śrāvyate tāsu kim iti arcirādi āśrayaṇam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1431: atra ucyate - bhavet etadevaṃ yadi atyantabhinnā eva etāḥ sṛtayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1432: eka eva tu eṣā sṛtiḥanekaviśeṣaṇā brahmalokaprapadanī kvacit kenacit viśeṣaṇena upalakṣita iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1434: prakaraṇabhede api hi vidyā ekatve bhavati itaretara viśeṣaṇa upasaṃhāravat gativiśeṣaṇānām api upasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1435: vidyābhede api tu gati ekadeśapratyabhijñānāt gantavya abhedāt ca gati abheda eva /
GSP33brssgo4u:1436: tathā hi 'te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti' (bṛ. 6.2.15)
GSP33brssgo4u:1438: vyuṣṭistāṃ jitiṃ jayati tāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ vyaśnute' (kauṣī. 1.4) 'tadya evaitaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindati' (chā. 8.4.3) iti ca tatra tatra tat eva ekaṃ phalaṃ brahmalokaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ pradarśyate yat tu etaiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam arcirādi āśrayaṇe na syāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1441: na hi eka eva śabdo raśmīn ca prāpayitum arhati arcirādīn ca vyāvartayitum
GSP33brssgo4u:1442: tasmāt raśmisaṃbandha eva ayamavadhāryata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1443: tvarāvacanaṃ tu arcirādi apekṣāyām api gantavyāntarāpekṣā śaighryārthatvāt na uparudhyate
GSP33brssgo4u:1445: api ca 'athaitayoḥ pathornakatareṇācana' (chā. 5.108) iti mārgadvayabhraṣṭānāṃ kaṣṭaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sthānam ācakṣāṇā pitṛyāṇavyatiriktam ekameva devayānam arcirādiparvāṇaṃ panthānaṃ prathayati bhūyāṃsi arcirādisṛtau mārgaparvāṇi alpīyāṃsi tu anyatra /
GSP33brssgo4u:1446: bhūyasāṃ ca anuguṇyena alpīyasāṃ nayanaṃ nyāyyam iti ataḥ api arcirādinā tat prathiteḥ iti uktam // 1 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1447: evamutkrāntiṃ nirūpya tatsādhyaṃ mārgaṃ gantavyaṃ ca nirūpayituṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1452: pūrvaṃ yadākadācinmṛtasyāpi phalaprāptiruktā tadvadyena kenacinmārgeṇa gatiriti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ vikalpaḥ, siddhānte mārgaikyamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1454: kiñca mārgabhede satyasmādayaṃ mārgastvarayā prāpaka iti yuktaṃ na mārgaikya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1463: parāvato dīrghāyuṣo hiraṇyagarbhasya parā dīrghāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarānvasanti kāryabrahmaṇo yā jitiḥ sarvatra jayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1468: yathā laukikamārge vilambastathā arcirādau neti tvarāvacanopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1478: kena punaḥ saṃniveśaviśeṣeṇa gativiśeṣāṇānām itaretara viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti tat etat suhṛt bhūtvā ācāryo grathayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1479: 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati sa vāyulokaṃ sa
GSP33brssgo4u:1480: indralokaṃ sa prajāpatilokaṃ sa brahmalokam'(kau. 1.3) iti kauṣītakīnāṃ devayānaḥ panthāḥ paṭhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1481: tatra arciḥ agnilokaśabdau tāvat ekārthau jvalanavacanatvāt iti na atra saṃniveśakramaḥ kvacit anveṣyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1482: vāyuḥ tu arcirādau vartmani na śrutaḥ katam asmin sthāne niveśayitavya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1484: āpūryamāṇapakṣamāpūryamāṇapakṣādyānṣaḍudaṅṅeti māṃsāstān māsebhyaḥsaṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsarādityam' (chā. 5.10.1,2) iti atra saṃvatsarāt parāñcam ādityāt arvāñcaṃ vāyum abhisaṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1487: tathā hi - 'sa vāyulokam '(kau. 1.3) iti atrāviśeṣa upadiṣṭasya vāyoḥ śrutyantare viśeṣa upadośo dṛśyate 'yadā vai puruṣo 'smāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ tena sa ūrdhvamākramate sa ādityamāgacchati' (bṛ. 5.101) iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1488: etasmāt ādityāt vāyoḥ pūrvatvadarśanāt viśeṣāt abda ādityayoḥ antarāle vāyuḥ niveśayitavyaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:1489: kasmāt punaḥ agneḥ paratvadarśanāt viśeṣāt arciṣaḥ anantaraṃ vāyuḥ na niveśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1490: na eṣaḥ asti viśeṣa iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1491: nanu udāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānamāpadyāgnilokamāgacchati
GSP33brssgo4u:1493: ucyate - kevala- atra pāṭhaḥ paurvāparyeṇāvasthito na atra kramavacanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1495: padārtha upadarśanamātraṃ hi atra kriyate etam etaṃ ca āgacchati iti itaratra punaḥ vāyuprattena rathacakramātreṇa cchidreṇa ūrdhvam ākramya ādityam āgacchati iti avagamyate kramaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1497: vājasaneyinaḥ tu 'māsebhyo devalokaṃ devalokādādityam' (bṛ. 6.2.15) iti samāmananti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1498: tatra ādityān antaryāya devalokāt vāyum abhisaṃbhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1499: vāyum abdāt iti tu chandogaśruti apekṣayā uktam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1500: chāndogya vājasaneyakayoḥ tu ekatra devaloko na vidyate paratra saṃvatsaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1501: tatra śrutidvayapratyayāt ubhau api ubhayatra grathayitavyau /
GSP33brssgo4u:1502: tatra api māsasaṃbandhāt saṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devaloka iti vivektavyam // 2 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1504: arcirādiṣvasmādayamanantara iti krameṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva ucyata ityadhikaraṇasya tātparyamuktvā viṣayamāha-sa etamiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1506: sa kiṃ arcirātmakāgneranantaramuta saṃvatsarātpara iti pāṭhādvakṣyamāṇaviśeṣaśruteśca saṃśaye siddhāntamevopakramate-ucyata iti
GSP33brssgo4u:1508: puruṣāya sa vāyustatra svātmani vijihīte chidraṃ karoti, tena vāyudattena rathacakrachidratulyena dvāreṇordhvamādityaṃ gacchatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1512: kāṇvānāṃ tu tenetyūrdhvamiti ca śabdābhyāṃ kramaniścayātpāṭhabādha iti siddhāntārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1514: vājiśrutisthe tu saṃvatsarasyāśruteḥ kathamabdātparo vāyurityata āha-vājeti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1515: tarhi devalokādvāyumiti sūtraṃ syādityata āha-vāyumabdāditi tviti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1516: saṃvatsarasya māsāvayavitvānmāsānantaryaṃ saṃvatsarātparo devalokastataḥ paro vāyurvāyoḥ para āditya iti śrutidvaye kramo niṣpannaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1517: teneti tṛtīyāśrutyā vāyorādityapūrvatvāvagamāditi, sūtre tu vāyupadaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1525: upariṣṭāt sa varuṇalokam iti ayaṃ varuṇaḥ saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1527: yadā hi viśāla avidyutaḥ tīvraḥ tanitaniḥ ghoṣā jīmūta udareṣu pranṛtyanti āthāpaḥ prapatanti
GSP33brssgo4u:1528: vidyotate stanayati 'varṣiṣyati vā' (chā. 7.11.1) iti ca brāhmaṇam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1529: apāṃ ca adhipatiḥ varuṇa iti śrutismṛtiprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1530: varuṇāt adhīndraprajāpatī sthānāntara abhāvāt pāṭhasāmarthyāt ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:1531: ānantukatvāt api varuṇādīnām anta eva niveśo vaiśeṣikasthānābhāvāt vidyut ca antya arcirādau vartmani // 3 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1532: evaṃ kauṣītakibhiragnyanantaraṃ paṭhitasya vāyoḥ sthānamuktvā vāyvanantaraṃ paṭhitasya varuṇasyārcirādimārge sthānamāha-taḍito 'dhi
GSP33brssgo4u:1534: paṭhito varuṇādirmārgaparvatvena saṃbadhyate na veti saṃdehe 'rciṣo
GSP33brssgo4u:1535: 'harityādi pañcamyārcirādīnāṃ krameṇa mārgaparvatayā baddhatvādvāyoriva sthānaviśeṣaśrutyabhāvādalabdhasthāno varuṇādirna saṃbadhyata iti prāpte
GSP33brssgo4u:1538: varuṇasyābdvārā vidyusaṃbandhāt 'āgantukānāmante niveśaḥ'iti nyāyāycca vidyudānantarye sati yathāpāṭhamindraprajāpatyoḥ krama ityarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo4u:1544: teṣu eva arcirādiṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim etāni mārgacihnāni uta bhogabhūmayaḥ athavā netāro gantṛṇām iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1545: tatra mārgalakṣaṇabhūtā arcirādaya iti tāvat prāptam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1547: yathā hi loke kaścit grāmaṃ nagaraṃ vā pratiṣṭhāsamānaḥ anuśiṣyate gacchetaḥ tvam amuṃ giriṃ tato nyagrodhaṃ tato nadīṃ tato grāmaṃ tato nagaraṃ vā prāpsyasi iti evam iha api arciṣo aharahna āpūryamāṇapakṣim ityādi āha /
GSP33brssgo4u:1551: lokaśabdaḥ ca prāṇināṃ bhogāyataneṣu bhāṣyate - 'manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko
GSP33brssgo4u:1553: tathā ca brāhmaṇam - 'ahorātreṣu te lokeṣu sajjante' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo4u:1556: cetanā hi loke rājaniyuktāḥ puruṣā durgeṣu mārgeṣu ativāhyān ativāhayanti iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1557: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ātivāhikā eva ete bhavitum arhanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1559: tathā hi 'candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa etānbrahma gamayati'
GSP33brssgo4u:1561: tat vacanaṃ tat viṣayam eva upakṣīṇam iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:1564: yadi arcirādiṣu puruṣā gamayitāraḥ prāptāḥ te ca mānavāḥ tato yuktaṃ tat nivṛttyarthaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇam amānava iti // 4 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1568: arcirādayo vidyudantāścetanā netāraścāmānavapurūṣeṇa netrā saha paṭhitatvāditi siddhāntayati-evamityādinā
GSP33brssgo4u:1570: puruṣasyāmānavatvaṃ netṛtvaṃ cetyubhayaparatve vākyabhedaḥ syādato 'rcirādipadairnetāra eva mānavāḥ prakṛtāḥ prakaraṇabalādvidyudanantaraṃ mānavasya netuḥ prāptau prakaraṇaprāptanetṛtvānuvādenāmānavatvamekameva pratipādyata iti vaktavyamityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1571: netṛprakaraṇānaṅgīkāre tvamānavaḥ puruṣo gamayatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta amānavatvavannetṛtvasyāpyaprāpteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1578: ye tāvat arcirādimārgāḥ te dehaviyogāt saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇagrāmā iti asvatantrā arcirādīnām api acetanatvāt asvātantryam iti ataḥ arcirādi abhimāninaḥ cetanā devatāviśeṣā atiyātrāyāṃ niyuktā iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1579: loke api hi matta mūrcchitādayaḥ saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇāḥ paraprayuktavartmāno bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1580: anavasthitatvāt api arcirādīnāṃ na mārgalakṣaṇatva upapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1581: na hi rātrau pretasya ahaḥsvarūpa abhisaṃbhava upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1582: na ca pratipālanamasti iti uktaṃ purastāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1583: dhruvatvāt tu devatā ātmānāṃ na ayaṃ doṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1584: arcirādi śabdatā ca eṣām arcirādi abhimānāt upapadyate 'arciṣo 'haḥ'(chā.
GSP33brssgo4u:1585: 4.15.5, 5,10.1) ityādinirdeśaḥ tu ativāhikatve api na virudhyate arciṣā hetunā ahaḥ abhisaṃbhavati
GSP33brssgo4u:1587: tathā ca loke prasiddheṣu api ativāhikeṣu evañjātīyaka upadeśo dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1588: gaccha tvam ito balavarmāṇaṃ tato jayasiṃhaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇaguptam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1589: api ca upakrame 'te 'rcirabhisaṃbhavanti' (bṛ. 6.2.15) iti saṃbandhamātramuktaṃ na saṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brssgo4u:1590: upasaṃhāre tu 'sa etānbrahma gamayati (chā. 4.15.6) iti saṃbandhaviśeṣaḥ ativāhi ativāhakatva lakṣaṇa uktaḥ tena sa eva upakrame api iti nirdhāryate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1591: saṃpiṇḍitakaraṇatvāt eva ca gantṛṣu na tatra upabhogasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1592: lokaśabdaḥ tu anupabhuñjāneṣu api gantṛṣu gamayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1594: ataḥ agnisvāmikaṃ lokaṃ prāptaḥ agninā ativāhyate vāyusvāmikaṃ prāpto vāyunā iti yojayitavyam yadyanetāro 'cetanā evārcirādayastarhi mārgatadgantrorubhayorapi vyāmohādajñatvādūrdhvagatirna syādataḥ svayaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1597: arciraharādīnāmasthiratvādrātryādau mṛtasya pratīkṣā nāstītyuktatvācca na mārgacihnatvaṃ bhogyatvaṃ vā, devatātve tvasthiratvadoṣo nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1605: vidyuto hi adhi varuṇādaya upakṣiptā vidyutaḥ tu anantaramā brahmaprāpteḥ amānavasya eva puruṣasya gamayitṛtvaṃ śrutam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1608: tato vidyut abhisaṃbhavanāt ūrdhvaṃ vidyut anantaravartina eva amānavena puruṣeṇa varuṇalokādiṣu ativāhyamānā brahmalokaṃ gacchanti iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1609: 'tānvaidyutātpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa etya brahmalokaṃ gamayati' iti tasya eva
GSP33brssgo4u:1611: varuṇādayaḥ tu tasya eva apratibandhakaraṇena sāhāyya anuṣṭhānena vā kenacit anugrāhakā iti avagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1612: tasmāt sādhu uktam ativāhikā devatātmānaḥ arcirādaya iti // 6 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1615: śrutyā varuṇādīnāṃ netṛtvābhāve 'pyanugrāhakatvena mārgāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo4u:1621: 'sa enānbrahma gamayati (chā. 4.15.5) iti atra vicikitsyate - kiṃ kāryam aparaṃ brahma gamayati āhosvit param eva avikṛtaṃ mukhyaṃ brahma iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1624: tatra kāryameva saguṇam aparaṃ brahma enān gamayati amānavaḥ puruṣa iti bādariḥ ācāryo manyate
GSP33brssgo4u:1627: asya hi kāryabrahmaṇo gantavyatvam upapadyate pradeśavattvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1628: na tu parasmin brahmaṇi gantṛtvaṃ gantavyatvaṃ gatiḥ vā avakalpate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1630: evaṃ mārgaṃ nirūpya gantavyaṃ cintayati-kāryaṃ bādarirasya gatyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1631: paraṃ brahma gantavyamiti pūrvapakṣe mārgasya muktyarthatā kāryaṃ brahmeti siddhānte bhogārthateti matvā prathamaṃ siddhāntamāha-tatra
GSP33brssgo4u:1638: brahmalokāngamayati te teṣu brahmalokeṣu parāḥ parāvato vasanti' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo4u:1639: 6.2.15) iti ca śrutyantare viśeṣitatvāt kāryabrahmaviṣaya eva gatiḥ iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1640: nahi bahuvacanena viśeṣaṇaṃ parasmin brahmaṇi avakalpate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1641: kārye tu avasthābheda upapatteḥ saṃbhavati bahuvacanam /
GSP33brssgo4u:1642: lokaśrutiḥ api vikāragocarāyāma eva saṃniveśaviśiṣṭāyāṃ bhogabhūmāvau āñjasī /
GSP33brssgo4u:1643: gauṇī tu anyatra 'brahmaiva loka eṣa samrāṭ' ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo4u:1644: adhikaraṇa adhikartavyanirdeśaḥ api parasmin brahmaṇi anāñjasaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1649: na cānāvṛttiliṅgātparasya gantavyatā, kramamuktyā liṅgasyānyathāsiddheriti bhāvaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo4u:1652: nanu kāryaviṣaye api brahmaśabdo na upapadyate samanvaye hi samastasya jagato janmādikāraṇaṃ sthāpitam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1656: parabrahmasāmīpyāt aparasya brahmaṇaḥ tasmin api brahmaśabdaprayogo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1657: param eva hi brahma viśuddha upādhisaṃbandhaṃ kvacit kaiścit vikāradharmaiḥ manomayatvādibhiḥ upāsanāya upadiśyamānam aparam iti sthitiḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1659: na hi parasmāt brahmaṇaḥ anyatra kvacit nityatāṃ saṃbhāvayanti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1660: darśayati ca devayānena pathā prasthitānām anāvṛttim /
GSP33brssgo4u:1661: 'etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvartaṃ nāvartante' (chā. 4.15.6) iti teṣām iha na punarāvṛttiḥ asti 'tayordhvamāyannamṛtatvameti' (chā. 8.6.6),
GSP33brssgo4u:1665: kāryabrahmalokapralayapratyupasthāne sati tatra eva utpannasamyagdarśanāḥ santaḥ tat adhyakṣeṇa hiraṇyagarbheṇa sahātaḥ paraṃ pariśuddhaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1667: na hi āñjasa eva gatipūrvikā paraprāptiḥ saṃbhavati iti upapaditam // 10
GSP33brssgo4u:1669: smṛtiḥ api etam artham anujānāti - 'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33brssgo4u:1671: tasmāt kāryabrahmaviṣayā gatiḥ śrūyata iti siddhāntaḥ // 11 //
GSP33brssgo4u:1672: kaṃ puna- pūrvapakṣam āśaṅkya ayaṃ siddhāntaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ 'kāryaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1676: jaiminiḥ tu ācāryaḥ 'sa enānbrahma gamayati'(chā. 4.15.6) iti atra parameva brahma prāpayati iti manyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1678: paraṃ hi brahma brahmaśabdasya mukhyam ālambanaṃ, gauṇam aparaṃ,
GSP33brssgo4u:1681: samaṣṭiliṅgaśarīrarūpavikārāvasāne brahmalokanivāsinaḥ kutātmānaḥ śuddhadhiyastatrotpannasamyagdhiyaḥ sarve brahmaṇā mucyamānena saha paraṃ padaṃ praviśantīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1682: evaṃ siddhāntamuktvā tena nirastaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-kaṃ punarityādinā //9
GSP33brssgo4u:1688: amṛtatvaṃ ca parasmin brahmaṇi upapadyate na kārye, vināśitvāt kāryasya /
GSP33brssgo4u:1690: paraviṣaya eva ca eṣā gatiḥ kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1691: na hi tatra vidyāntaraprakramaḥ asti 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' (ka.
GSP33brssgo4u:1693: daharavidyāyāṃ kaṭhavallīṣu parabrahmaprakaraṇe ca tayordhvamāyanniti gatirdarśitā //13//
GSP33brssgo4u:1697: api ca 'prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadye' (chā. 8.14.1) iti na ayaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:1698: kāryaviṣayaḥ pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ 'nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1) iti kāryavilakṣaṇasya parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1701: 'na tasya pratimā asti, yasya nāmamahadyaśaḥ' (śvetā. 4.19) iti ca parasya
GSP33brssgo4u:1703: 'sā ceyaṃ veśmapratipattirgatipūrvikā hārdavidyāyāmuditā tadaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam' (chā. 8.5.3) iti atra /
GSP33brssgo4u:1704: paderapi ca gatyarthatvāt mārga apekṣā avasīyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1706: tau etau dvau pakṣau ācāryeṇa sūtritau gati upapattyādibhiḥ eko mukhyatvādibhiḥ aparaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1707: tatra gati upapattyādayaḥ prabhavanti mukhyatvādīna ābhāsayituṃ na tu mukhyatvādayo gati upapattyādīn ityādya eva siddhānto vyākhyāto dvitīyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1708: na hi asati api saṃbhave mukhyasya eva arthasya grahaṇam iti kaścit ājñāpayitā vidyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1709: paravidyāprakaraṇe api ca tat stutyarthaṃ vidyāntara āśrayagati anukīrtanam upapadyate 'viṣvaṅṅanyā utkramaṇe bhavanti' (chā. 8.6.6)
GSP33brssgo4u:1711: 'prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadye' (chā. 8.14.1) iti tu pūrvavākyavicchedena kārye api pratipatti abhisaṃdhiḥ na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1712: saguṇe api ca brahmaṇi sarvātmatva saṃkīrtanaṃ sarvakarmā sarvakāma ityādivat avakalpate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1714: kecit punaḥ pūrvāṇi pūrvapakṣasūtrāṇi bhavanti uttarāṇi siddhāntasūtrāṇi iti etāṃ vyavasthānam anurudhyamānāḥ paraviṣayā eva gatiśrutīḥ pratiṣṭhāpayanti tat anupapannaṃ gantavyatva anupapatteḥ brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1715: yat sarvagataṃ sarvāntaraṃ sarvātmakaṃ ca paraṃ brahma
GSP33brssgo4u:1718: 'brahmaivedaṃ viśvamidaṃ variṣṭham' (mu. 2.2.11) ityādi śrutinirdhārita viśeṣaṃ tasya gantavyatā na kadācit api upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1720: anyo hi anyat gacchati iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssgo4u:1721: nanu loke gatasya api gantavyatā deśāntaraviśiṣṭā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1722: yathā pṛthivīstha eva pṛthivīṃ deśāntaradvāreṇa gacchati iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1723: tathā ananyatve api sarvaśakti upetatvāt kathañcit gantavyatā syāt iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1729: 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā'(bṛ. 3.9.23) ityādi śruti smṛti nyāyebhyo na deśakālādi viśeṣayogaḥ paramātmani kalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1730: yena bhūpradeśa vayovasthā nyāyena asya gantavyatā syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1731: bhūvayasoḥ tu pradeśa avasthādi viśeṣayogāt upapadyate deśa kāla viśiṣṭā gantavyatā /
GSP33brssgo4u:1732: jagat utpatti sthiti pralayahetutva śruteḥ anekaśaktitvaṃ brahmaṇa iti cet
GSP33brssgo4u:1735: utpattyādiśrutīnām api samānam ananyārthatvam iti cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:1738: mṛdādi dṛṣṭāntaiḥ hi sato brahmaṇa ekasya satyatvaṃ vikārasya ca āvṛtatvaṃ pratipādayat śāstraṃ na utpattyādiparaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:1739: kasmāt punaḥ utpattyādi śrutīnāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ na punaḥ itara śeṣatvam itarāsām iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:1741: na hi ātmana ekatva nityatva śuddhatvādi avagatau satyāṃ bhūyaḥ kācit ākāṅkṣā upajāyate puruṣārthasamāptibuddhi upapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:1742: 'tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (īśā. 7) 'abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'si' (bṛ. 4.2.4) 'vidvānna bibheti kutaścana /
GSP33brssgo4u:1743: etaṃ ha vāva na tapati kimahaṃ sādhu nākaravaṃ kimahaṃ pāpamakaravam'
GSP33brssgo4u:1745: tathā eva ca viduṣāṃ tuṣṭi anubhavādi darśanāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:1746: vikāra anṛta abhisaṃdhi apavādāt ca 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' iti
GSP33brssgo4u:1747: ato na viśeṣanirākaraṇa śrutīnām anyaśeṣatvam avagantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:1748: na evam utpattyādi śrutīnāṃ nirākāṅkṣārtha pratipādanasāmarthyam asti /

GSP33brssgo4u:1988: gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati'(chā. 7.2.2) 'mano vāva vāco bhūyaḥ'

GSP33brssgo4u:2010: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ devalokādi upabhogasthāneṣu iva āgantukena kenacit
GSP33brssgo4u:2013: sthānāntareṣu iva āgantukena kenacit rūpeṇa abhiniṣpattiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2016: svarūpamātreṇa cet abhiniṣpattiḥ pūrvāsu api avasthāsu svarūpa anāpāyāt vibhāvyeta /
GSP33brssgo4u:2018: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - kevalena eva ātmana āvirbhavati na dharmāntareṇa iti
GSP33brssgo4u:2019: kutaḥ - svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata iti svaśabdāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2020: anyathā hi svaśabdena iti viśeṣaṇam anavakḷptaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2024: yena eva hi kenacit rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate tasya eva ātmīyatva upapatteḥ svena iti viśeṣaṇamna arthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2025: ātmavacanatāyāṃ tu arthavat kevalena eva ātmarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate na āgantukena apararūpeṇāpi iti // 1 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2026: pūrvapāde brahmopāsakānāṃ kāryabrahmaprāptiruktā, saṃprati teṣāmaiśvaryaviśeṣaṃ brāhmalaukikaṃ pādasyottarārdhena prapañcayiṣyannādāvabhyarhitaparavidyāprāpyaṃ nirviśeṣabrahmabhāvamāha-saṃpadyāvirbhāvaḥ svenaśabdāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2028: pūrvapakṣe mokṣasya svargādaviśeṣaḥ, siddhānte viśeṣa iti phalaṃ, tatra mokṣa āgantukaḥ, phalatvātsvargavaditi nyāyopetayābhiniṣpattiśrutyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kimityādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:2029: svaśabdaśrutibādhito nyāyaḥ abhiniṣpattiśca sākṣātkāravṛttyabhiprāyā bandhadhvaṃsajanmanyaupacārikveveti matvā siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2030: mokṣasya phalatvena prāptāgantukatvanirāsārthaḥ svaśabda iti yuktaṃ svīyavācitve 'tvanarthakānuvādaḥ syādityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo4u:2033: kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ pūrvāsu avasthāsu iha ca svarūpa anapāyasāmye sati ityata āha -
GSP33brssgo4u:2035: yaḥ atra abhiniṣpadyata iti uktaḥ sa sarvabandha vinirmuktaḥ śuddhena eva ātmanā avatiṣṭhate
GSP33brssgo4u:2036: pūrvatra tu andho bhavati api roditi iva vināśameva apīto bhavati iti ca avasthātraya kaluṣitena ātmana iti ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2037: kathaṃ punaḥ avagamyate muktaḥ ayam idānīṃ bhavati iti - pratijñānāt ityāha /
GSP33brssgo4u:2039: 8.11.3) iti avasthātraya doṣavihīnam ātmānaṃ vyākhyeyatvena pratijñāya
GSP33brssgo4u:2040: 'aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ (chā. 8.12.1) iti ca upanyasya 'svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ' (chā. 8.12.3) iti ca upasaṃharati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2041: tathā ākhyāyika upakrame api 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā' (chā. 8.7.1) ityādi mukta ātmaviṣayam eva pratijñānam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2042: phalatvaprasiddhiḥ api mokṣasya bandhanivṛttimātra apekṣā na apūrva upajanana apekṣā /
GSP33brssgo4u:2043: yat api abhiniṣpadyata iti utpattiparyāyatvaṃ tat api pūrva avasthāpekṣaṃ yathā roganivṛttau arogaḥabhiniṣpadyata iti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo4u:2046: jāgarite hyāndhyādidehadharmavānbhavati svapne tu hata eva kenacit /
GSP33brssgo4u:2047: apica putrādināśādroditīva bhavati, suṣuptau tu viśeṣājñānādvinaṣṭa
GSP33brssgo4u:2048: iveti, bandhadaśāyāṃ kaluṣitātmanā tiṣṭhati mokṣe tu vigalitākhiladuḥkhaḥ paritaḥ pradyotamānapūrṇānandātmanāvatiṣṭhata iti mahān viśeṣa ityarthaḥ //2//
GSP33brssgo4u:2052: kathaṃ punaḥ mukta iti ucyate - yāvatā 'paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya' (chā.
GSP33brssgo4u:2055: na ca anativṛtto vikāraviṣayāt kaścit mukto bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2058: yata jyotiḥ śabdena āvedyate prakaraṇāt 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyuḥ' (chā. 8.7.1) iti hi prakṛte parasmin ātmani na akasmāt bhautikaṃ jyotiḥ śakyaṃ grahītum /
GSP33brssgo4u:2060: jyotiḥśabdaḥ tu ātmani api dṛśyate 'taddevā jyotiṣaṃ jyotiḥ (bṛ. 4.4.16)
GSP33brssgo4u:2065: kāryaṃ prāpto 'pi muktaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-na cānativṛtta iti //3//
GSP33brssgo4u:2071: paraṃ jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate yaḥ sa kiṃ parasmāt ātmanaḥ pṛthageva bhavati uta avibhāgena eva avatiṣṭhata vīkṣāyām sa
GSP33brssgo4u:2072: 'tatra paryeti' ( 8.12.3) iti adhikaraṇa adhikartavya nirdeśāt jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya (chā. 8.12.3) iti ca kartṛkarmanirdeśāt bhedena eva avasthānam
GSP33brssgo4u:2073: iti yasya matiḥ taṃ vyutpādayati avibhakta eva pareṇa ātmanā muktaḥ avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2077: yatpaśyet' (bṛ. 4.3.23) iti evamādīni vākyāni avibhāgena eva paramātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:2079: yathādarśanam eva ca phalaṃ yuktaṃ tatkratu nyāyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2081: evaṃ muneḥ vijānata ātmā bhavati gautama' (ka. 4.15) iti ca evamādīni
GSP33brssgo4u:2085: 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti sve mahimni' (chā. 7.24.1) iti
GSP33brssgo4u:2088: svarūpasthitamuktamupajīvya vādivivādāt brahmabhedābhedasaṃśaye satyatyantabhedaṃ pūrvapakṣamuktvā siddhāntamāha-yasyeti //4//
GSP33brssgo4u:2094: sthitam etat 'svena rūpeṇa'(chā. 8.3.4) iti atra ātmamātrarūpeṇa
GSP33brssgo4u:2096: adhunā tu tat viśeṣabubhutsāyām abhidhīyate svam asya rūpaṃ brāhmam apahatapāpmatvādi satyasaṃkalpatva avasānaṃ tathā sarvajñatvaṃ sarveśvaratvaṃ ca tena svarūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyata iti jaiminiḥ ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2099: satyasaṃkalpaḥ' (chā. 8.7.1) iti evam antena upanyāsena evam ātmakatām
GSP33brssgo4u:2101: tathā 'sa tatra paryeti jakṣankrīḍanramamāṇaḥ' (chā. 8.12.3) iti aiśvaryarūpam āvedayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2102: 'tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' (chā. 7.25.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:2103: 'sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ' ityādi vyapadeśāḥ ca evam upapannā bhaviṣyanti iti
GSP33brssgo4u:2104: brāhmeṇa jaiminiḥuktaṃ brahma svarūpamupajīvya sa kiṃ satyena sarvajñatvādidharmeṇa yuktastiṣṭhati uta dharmasya śaśaśṛṅgavadatyantāsattvāccinmātrātmanā tiṣṭhati kiṃ vā vastutaścinmātro 'pi jīvāntaravyavahāradṛṣṭyā kalpitasarvajñatvādimāniti munivipratipatteḥ saṃśaye satyādyaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-adhunetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo4u:2109: sarvajña ityādistu vyapadeśo 'yaṃ hi noddeśaḥ vidhyabhāvānnāpi vidhiḥ siddhavannirdeśādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2113: yadyapi apahapāpmatvādayobhedena eva dharmā nirdiśyante tathā api śabdavikalpajā eva ete /
GSP33brssgo4u:2115: caitanyameva tu asya ātmanaḥ svarūpam iti tanmātreṇa svarūpeṇa abhiniṣpattiḥ yuktā /
GSP33brssgo4u:2116: tathā ca śrutiḥ - 'evaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva' (bṛ. 4.5.13) iti evañjātīyakā anugṛhītā bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2117: satyakāmatvādayaḥ tu yadi api vastusvarūpeṇa eva dharmā ucyante satyāḥ kāmā asya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2118: tathā api upādhisaṃbandha adhīnatvāt teṣāṃ na caitanyavat svarūpasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2120: pratiṣiddhaṃ hi brahmaṇaḥ aneka ākāratvam 'na sthānato 'pi
GSP33brssgo4u:2122: ata eva ca jakṣaṇādi saṃkīrtanam api duḥkha abhāvamātra abhiprāyaṃ stutyartham ātmaratiḥ ityādivat
GSP33brssgo4u:2123: na hi mukhyāni eva ratikrīḍāmithunāni ātmani śakyante varṇayituṃ dvitīya viṣayatvāt teṣām
GSP33brssgo4u:2124: tasmāt nirasta aśeṣaprapañcena prasannena avyapadeśyena bodhātmanā abhiniṣpadyata iti auḍulomiḥ ācāryo manyate // 6 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2126: citiścaitanyaṃ, śabdajñānādyo vikalpo 'sanpratyayastajjāḥ atyantāsanta iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo4u:2129: cinmātre mukte jakṣaṇādiśrutiḥ kathaṃ tatrāha-ata eva ceti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2133: evam apy upanyāsāt pūrvabhāvād avirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ |
GSP33brssgo4u:2134: evam api pāramārthika caitanyamātrasvarūpa abhyupagame api vyavahāra apekṣayā pūrvasya api upanyāsādibhyaḥ avagatasya brāhmasya aiśvaryarūpasya apratyayākhyānāt avirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇa ācāryo manyate //7 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2139: ye īśvaradharmāsta eva cidātmani mukte jīvāntarairvyavahriyante iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2140: naca mūlāvidyaikyāttannāśe kuto jīvāntaramiti vācyaṃ, na vayaṃ tannāśe
GSP33brssgo4u:2141: jīvāntaravyavahāraṃ brūmaḥ, kintu tadaṃśanāśenāṃśārabdhādhyātmikaśarīradvayābhimānino muktāvaṃśāntaropādhikā jīvā vyavahartāra iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2142: tarhi nānavidyāpakṣa eva kuto nādriyate jīvabhedasyāvaśyakatvāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo4u:2144: prakṛtinānātvaṃ pratijīvaṃ prapañcabheda ityādyaprāmāṇikānekārthagauravāditi sarvavṛddhasaṃmata ekāvidyāpakṣa eva
GSP33brssgo4u:2151: hārdavidyāyāṃ śrūyate - 'sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṃkalpādevāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti' (chā. 8.2.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo4u:2152: tatra saṃśayaḥ kiṃ saṃkalpa eva kevalaḥ pitrādisamutthāne hetuḥ uta nimittāntara sahita iti
GSP33brssgo4u:2153: tatra sati api saṃkalpādeva iti śravaṇe lokavat nimittāntara apekṣatā yuktā /
GSP33brssgo4u:2154: yathā loke asmadādīnāṃ saṃkalpāt gamanādibhyaḥ ca hetubhyaḥ pitrādi saṃpattiḥ bhavati evaṃ muktasya api syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2156: saṃkalpādeva iti tu rājña iva saṃkalpitārthasiddhikarīṃ sādhanāntarasāmagrīṃ sulabhām apekṣya ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2157: na ca saṃkalpamātrasam utthānāḥ pitrādayo manorathāvijṛmbhitavat calatvāt puṣkalaṃ bhogaṃ samarpayituṃ paryāptāḥ syuḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2158: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ saṃkalpādeva tu kevalāt pitrādisamutthānam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2162: nimittāntaram api tu yadi saṃkalpa anuvidhāyi eva syāt bhavatu na tu prayatnāntarasaṃpādyaṃ nimittāntaram iti iṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2164: na ca śruti avagamye arthe lokavat iti sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ kramate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2165: saṃkalpabalāt eva ca eṣāṃ yāvat prayojanaṃ sthairya upapattiḥ.
GSP33brssgo4u:2170: na caivakāravirodhaḥ saṃkalpena sāmagryā ayogavyavacchedena saulabhyārthatvāt, yatnānaṅgīkāre bhogapuṣṭyasiddheśceti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2171: atra lokavṛttānusaraṇaṃ phalaṃ, siddhānte tu vidyābalena saṃkalpasyaiva bhogapuṣṭikaratvasiddhiriti bedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2172: kiñca yadi bhogasaṃkalpānantaramapi yatnāntarasādhyanimittāpekṣā syāttarhi nimittaprāpteḥ prāgjātasaṃkalpasya vandhyatvaṃ syādbhoge vilambāttataḥ satyasaṃkalpaśruterna yatnāntarāpekṣetyāha-nimittāntaramapi tviti //8//
GSP33brssgo4u:2176: ata eva ca avandhyasaṃkalpatvāt ananya adhipatiḥ vidvān bhavati na asya anyaḥ adhipatiḥ bhavati ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2177: na hi prākṛto api saṃkalpayan anyasvāmikatvam ātmanaḥ satyāṃ gatau saṃkalpayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2178: śrutiḥ ca etat darśayati - 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyeśca
GSP33brssgo4u:2179: satyānkāmāṃsteṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' (chā. 8.1.6) iti // 9
GSP33brssgo4u:2182: īśvaradharma eva viduṣyāvirbhūta iti na saṃkalpabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ //9//
GSP33brssgo4u:2190: śarīra indriyāṇi punaḥ prāpta aiśvaryasya viduṣaḥ santi na vā santi iti samīkṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2191: tatra bādariḥ tāvat ācāryaḥ śarīrasya indriyāṇāṃ ca abhāvaṃ mahīyamānasya viduṣo manyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2197: jaiminiḥ tu ācāryo manovat śarīrasya api sendriyasya bhāvaṃ muktaṃ prati manyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2198: yataḥ 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati'(chā. 7.23.2) ityādinā anekadhā abhāvavikalpam āmananti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2199: na hi anekavidhatā vinā śarīrabhedena āñjasī syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2200: yadi api nirguṇāyāṃ bhūmavidyāyām ayam anekadhā abhāvavikalpaḥ paṭhyate tathā api vidyamānameva idaṃ saguṇāvasthāyām aiśvaryaṃ bhūmavidyā stutaye saṃkīrtyata iti ataḥ saguṇavidyāphalabhāvena upatiṣṭhata iti // 11 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2203: atrāpi vādivivādātsaṃśayaḥ, tatra dehādayo na santyeva sadā santyeveti
GSP33brssgo4u:2205: kālabhedenecchayā santi na santi ceti siddhāntapakṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2212: bādarāyaṇaḥ punaḥ ācāryaḥ ata eva ubhayaliṅgaśrutidarśanāt ubhayavidhatvaṃ sādhu manyate yadā saśarīratāṃ saṃkalpayati tadā saśarīro bhavati yadā tu aśarīratāṃ tadā aśarīra iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2216: yathā dvādaśa ahaḥsatram ahīnaḥ ca bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2217: ubhayaliṅga śrutidarśanāt evam idam api iti // 12 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2219: yadā tanoḥ sendriyasya śarīrasya abhāvaḥ tadā yathā saṃdhye sthāne śarīra indriyaviṣayeṣu avidyamāneṣu api upalabdhimātrā eva pitrādikāmā bhavati evaṃ mokṣe api syuḥ evaṃ hi etat upapadyate bhāve jāgradvat |
GSP33brssgo4u:2220: bhāve punaḥ tanoḥ yathā jāgarite vidyamānā eva pitrādikāmā bhavanti evaṃ muktasya api upapadyate dvādaśāhavaditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:2222: satratvaṃ, āsateti copayantīti vā coditatvaṃ satralakṣaṇamiti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2223: tathā dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanādarśanānniyatakartṛkatvāvagamena dvirātrādivadahīnatvaṃ cetyarthaḥ //12 // //13 // //14//
GSP33brssgo4u:2231: tatra tridhābhāvādiṣu anekaśarīrasarge kiṃ nirātmakāni śarīrāṇi dāruyantrāṇi iva sṛjyante kiṃ vā sātmakāni asmadādi śarīravat iti bhavati vīkṣā /
GSP33brssgo4u:2232: tatra ca ātma manasoḥ bheda anupapatteḥ ekena śarīreṇa yogāt itarāṇi śarīrāṇi nirātmakāni iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2233: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate - pradīpavat āveśa iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2234: yathā pradīpa ekaḥ anekapradīpabhāvam āpadyate vikāraśaktiyogāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2235: evam ekaḥ api san vidvāna aiśvaryayogāt anekabhāvam āpadya sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi āviśati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2236: kutaḥ, tathā hi darśayati śāstram ekasya anekabhāvam - 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhā' (chā. 7.26.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo4u:2237: na etat dāruyantra upamā abhyupagame avakalpate na api jīvāntarāveśe /
GSP33brssgo4u:2238: na ca nirātmakānāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2239: yat tu ātma manasoḥ bheda anupapatteḥ anekaśarīrayoga asaṃbhava iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2241: ekamanonuvartini samanaskāni eva aparāṇi śarīrāṇi satyasaṃkalpatvāt srakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2242: sṛṣṭeṣu ca teṣu upādhibhedāt ātmanaḥ api bhedena adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ yokṣyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2243: eṣa eva ca yogaśāstreṣu yoginām anekaśarīraprayogakriyā // 15 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2247: anādiliṅgaśarīrasyaikasminneva śarīre bhāvānnirmitānekadeheṣu bhogāsiddhiḥ pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā sūtraṃ
GSP33brssgo4u:2249: sa ekadhā tridhā pañcadhetyādiśrutyā viduṣa evānekadhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2255: liṅgasya tu dehabhedakṛto bhedo na svataḥ, svato liṅgabhede tadupahitajīvabhedādanusaṃdhānānupapatteḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2257: tathāpi pradīpatvajātyaikyena vyaktiṣvaikyāropāt dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ sāmyaṃ dṛṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2258: tathāca yathā pradīpo 'naikavartiṣu praviśati evaṃ vidyāyogabalādvidvaliṅgasya vyāpitvādanekadeheṣu yugapadāveśa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2261: yadanādi mana ekadehasthaṃ tadanusārīṇi dehāntarasthāpi manāṃsi bhavanti tadavasthānāṃ tanniyamyatvasaṃbhavāditi
GSP33brssgo4u:2263: nirmāṇacittānyasmitāmātrātpravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittamekamanekeṣāmiti hi bhagavatpatañjalinā sūtritam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2267: kathaṃ punaḥ muktasya anekaśarīra āveśādilakṣaṇam aiśvaryam abhyupagamyate yāvatā 'tatkena kaṃ vijānīyāt' (bṛ. 4.5.15) 'na tu taddvitīyamasti tato
GSP33brssgo4u:2268: 'nyadvibhaktaṃ yadvijānīyāt' (bṛ. 4.3.30) 'salila eko draṣṭādvaito bhavati' (bṛ. 4.3.32) iti ca evañjātīyakā śrutiḥ viśeṣavijñānaṃ vārayati
GSP33brssgo4u:2274: tayoḥ anyatarām avasthām apekṣya etat viśeṣasaṃjñābhāva vacanam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2275: kvacit suṣupta avasthām apekṣya ucyate kvacit kaivalya avasthām /
GSP33brssgo4u:2276: katham avagamyate yataḥ tatra eva etat adhikāravaśāt āviṣkṛtam 'etebhyo
GSP33brssgo4u:2277: bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānu vinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāstīti' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo4u:2278: 2.4.14) 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūt' (bṛ. 2.4.14) 'yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 4.3.19, māṇḍū. 5)
GSP33brssgo4u:2280: saguṇavidyāvipāka avasthānaṃ tu etat svargādivat avasthāntaraṃ yatra etat aiśvaryam upavarṇyate
GSP33brssgo4u:2286: evaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvavacanaṃ suṣuptimuktyanyatarāpekṣaṃ saguṇopāsakasya bhogoktau na virudhyate bhinnaviṣayatvādityāha-svāpyayeti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2290: atra samutthānādivākyaṃ muktiviṣayaṃ yatra suptā iti suptiviṣayamiti vibhāgaḥ //16//
GSP33brssgo4u:2296: ye saguṇabrahma upāsanāt saha eva manasā īśvarasāyujyaṃ vrajanti kiṃ teṣāṃ niravagraham aiśvaryaṃ bhavati āhosvit sāvagraham iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2298: niraṅ kuśameva eṣām aiśvaryaṃ bhavitum arhati 'āpnoti svārājyam' (tai.
GSP33brssgo4u:2299: 1.6.2) 'sarve 'smai devā balimāvahanti' (tai. 1.5.3) 'teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' (chā. 7.25.2, 8.1.6) ityādi śrutibhya iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2300: evaṃ prāpte paṭhati - jagat vyāpāravarjam iti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2301: jagat utpattyādi vyāpāraṃ varjayitvā anyat aṇimādi ātmakam aiśvaryaṃ muktānāṃ bhavitum arhati jagat vyāpāraḥ tu nityasiddhasya eva īśvarasya /
GSP33brssgo4u:2302: kutaḥ - tasya tatra prakṛtatvāt asaṃnihitatvāt ca itareṣām /
GSP33brssgo4u:2303: para eva hi īśvaro jagat vyāpāre adhikṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2306: tat anveṣaṇavijijñāsanapūrvakaṃ tu itareṣām aṇimādi aiśvaryaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2308: samanaskatvāt eva ca eteṣām anaikamatye kasyacit sthiti abhiprāyaḥ kasyacit saṃhāra abhiprāya iti evaṃ virodhaḥ api kadācit syāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2309: atha kasyacit saṃkalpam anvayasya saṃkalpa iti avirodhaḥ samarthyeta tataḥ parameśvara ākūtatantratvam eva itareṣām iti vyavatiṣṭhate // 17 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2313: īśvaranānātvaṃ pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ, siddhānte tu vidyāyogināmīśvaraniyamyatvādekasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasyaiva jagatkartṛtvasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2314: pralayātsargasamaye yasyekṣaṇapūrvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ śrutau prakṛtaṃ tasyaiva niyantṛtvādirjagadvyāpāraḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2320: ekaṃ pratyanyeṣāṃ guṇatve tveka eveśvara ityāha-samanaskatvāditi //17//
GSP33brssgo4u:2324: atha yat uktam 'āpnoti svārājyam' (tai. 1.6.2) ityādi pratyakṣa upadeśāt
GSP33brssgo4u:2325: niravagraham aiśvaryaṃ viduṣāṃ nyāyyam iti tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2329: ādhikāriko yaḥ savitṛmaṇḍalādiṣu viśeṣa āyataneṣu avasthitaḥ para īśvaraḥ tadāyatta eva iyaṃ svārājyaprāptiḥ ucyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2331: yo hi sarvamanasāṃ patiḥ pūrvasiddha īśvaraḥ taṃ prāpnoti iti etat uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2334: evam anyatra api yathāsaṃbhavaṃ nityasiddha īśvara āyattam eva itareṣām aiśvaryaṃ yojayitavyam adhikāre niyojayatyādityādīnityādhikārikaḥ, sa cāsau maṇḍalasthaśca
GSP33brssgo4u:2336: manasaspatiḥ sūryamaṇḍalāntaḥsthaḥ paramātmā 'tat saviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi
GSP33brssgo4u:2338: tathāca yadi pūrvaṃ niraṅkuśaṃ svārājyamuktaṃ syāttarhi īśvarasyāgre prāpyatāṃ na brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo4u:2339: ato bhoge svārājyaṃ na jagajjanmādiṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2344: vikārāvarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha |
GSP33brssgo4u:2345: vikārāvartyapi ca nityamuktaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpaṃ na kevalaṃ vikāramātragocaraṃ savitṛmaṇḍalādi adhiṣṭhānam /
GSP33brssgo4u:2346: tathā hi asya dvirūpāṃ sthitim āha āmnāyaḥ 'tāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyāṃśca puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2347: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni, tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.6) iti evamādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2348: na ca tat nirvikāraṃ rūpam itara ālambanāḥ prāpnuvanti iti śakyaṃ vaktum atatkratutvāt teṣām
GSP33brssgo4u:2349: ataḥ ca yathā eva dvirūpe parameśvare nirguṇaṃ rūpam anavāpya saguṇa eva avatiṣṭhanta evaṃ saguṇaḥ api niravagraham aiśvaryam anavāpya sāvagraha eva avatiṣṭhanta iti draṣṭavyam // jagadvyāpāra upāsakaprāpyaḥ tadupāsyaniṣṭhatvātsaṃkalpasiddhyādivadityāśaṅkyopāsyasthanirguṇasvarūpe
GSP33brssgo4u:2354: darśayataḥ ca vikāra āvartitvaṃ parasya jyotiṣaḥ śruti smṛtī /
GSP33brssgo4u:2355: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamagniḥ'
GSP33brssgo4u:2357: 'na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅ ko na pāvakaḥ' (gī. 15.6) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo4u:2358: tat evaṃ vikāra āvartitvaṃ parasya jyotiṣaḥ prasiddham iti abhiprāyaḥ //
GSP33brssgo4u:2360: yathā jñānābhāvānnirguṇaṃ na prāptaṃ tathā dhyānābhāvājjagatsraṣṭṛtvādi na prāpyate /
GSP33brssgo4u:2365: itaḥ ca na niraṅ kuśaṃ vikāra ālambanānām aiśvaryaṃ yasmāt bhogamātram eva eṣām anādisiddhena īśvareṇa samānam iti śrūyate - 'tamāhāpo vai khalu mīyante loko 'sau' iti 'sa yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavantyevaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati'(bṛ. 1.5.23) ityādibhedavyapadeśaliṅgebhyaḥ // 21 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2367: amṛtarūpā mīyante bhujyante tavāpyasau loko 'mṛtodakalakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2375: nanu evaṃ sati sātiśayatvāt antavattvam aiśvaryasya syāt tataḥ ca eṣām āvṛttiḥ prasajyeta ityata uttaraṃ bhagavān bādarāyaṇa ācāryaḥ paṭhati -
GSP33brssgo4u:2377: nāḍīraśmisamanvitena arcirādiparvaṇā devayānena pathā ye brahmalokaṃ śāstroktaviśeṣaṇaṃ gacchanti yasminnaraśca ha vai ṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyāmito divi yasminnaśvatthaḥ somasavano yasminnaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇo yasmiṃśca prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśma yaścānekadhā mantrārthavādādipradeśeṣu prapañcyate te taṃ prāpya na candralokādivabhuktabhogā āvartante /
GSP33brssgo4u:2382: antavattve api tu aiśvaryasya yathā anāvṛttiḥ tathā varṇitam 'kāryātyaye
GSP33brssgo4u:2384: samyak darśanavidhvasta tamasāṃ tu nityasiddhanirvāṇaparāyaṇānāṃ siddha eva anāvṛttiḥ tadāśrayaṇena eva hi nityasiddhanirvāṇaparāyaṇānāṃ siddhā eva anāvṛttiḥ tadāśrayaṇena eva hi saguṇaśaraṇānām api anāvṛttisiddhiḥ iti
GSP33brssgo4u:2385: anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt anāvṛttiḥ śabdāt iti sūtra abhyāsaḥ śāstraparisamāptiṃ dyotayati // 22 //
GSP33brssgo4u:2389: bādarāyaṇapadena badarikāśramavāsoktyā nityasarvajñasya paramagurornārāyaṇasya prasādadyotanāttapraṇītaśāstre niravadyatāṃ dyotayati /
GSP33brssgo4u:2392: ye brahmalokaṃ gacchanti te taṃ prāpya nāvartante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2394: ito 'smātpṛthivīlokāttṛtīyasyāṃ divi yo brahmalokastasminnara iti ṇya iti cārṇakatulyau sudhāhṛdāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2395: airamannamayaṃ, madīyaṃ madakaraṃ saraḥ, somasavanaḥ amṛtavarṣī /
GSP33brssgo4u:2396: yadyapi teṣāmiha na punarāvṛttirimaṃ mānavamiti ca śrutiṣvihemamiti viśeṣaṇādasminkalpe brahmalokaṃ gatānāṃ kalpāntare āvṛttirbhāti,
GSP33brssgo4u:2397: tathāpīśvaropāstiṃ vinā pañcāganividyāśvamedhadṛḍhabrahmacaryādisādhanairye gatāsteṣāṃ tattvajñānaniyamābhāvādāvṛttiḥ syāt, ye tu daharādīśvaropāstyā
GSP33brssgo4u:2400: nanvatra sūtrakṛtā saguṇavidāmevānāvṛttikrama ukto na nirguṇavidāṃ tatra ko heturityāśaṅkya teṣāmāvṛttiśaṅkābhāvādityāha-samyagiti /
GSP33brssgo4u:2402: saguṇavidāmāvṛttiprāptau samyagdarśanāśrayaṇenaivānāvṛttiḥ sādhitā, ataḥ svata eva samyagdarśināmāvṛttiśaṅkā neti kimu vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2403: yatrādhyāyasamāptistatra padamātrasyābhyāso darśitaḥ, iha sūtrasyaivābhyāsācchāstrasamāptirdyetyata ityāha-anāvṛttiḥ śabdāditi /
GSP33brssgo4u:2404: evaṃ samanvayoktyā brahmātmaikyasya vedāntapramāṇakatvamavadhārayituṃ vākyārthajñāne smṛtitarkādisarvaprakāravirodhaḥ
GSP33brssgo4u:2410: śārīkasya bhāṣyasya kṛtā vyākhyā satāṃ mude //1//
GSP33brssgo4u:2413: vakṣasyakṣṇośca pārśve karatalayugale kaustubhābhāṃ dayāṃ ca sītāṃ kodaṇḍadīkṣāmabhayavarayutāṃ vīkṣya rāmāṅgasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo4u:2414: svasyāḥ kva syāditīyaṃ hṛdi kṛtamananā bhāṣyaratnaprabhākhyā,
GSP33brssgo4u:2416: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadgopālasarasvatīpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // iti caturthasyādhyāyasya brahmaprāpti-brahmalokasthitinirūpaṇākhyaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ
